loans.name: Wendlassida Group

texts.fr: Ouinlassida, membre représentatif est mariée et mère de 4 enfants. Cette brave dame, vend des condiments et aussi des céréales. Elle a besoin de ce crédit pour acheter un peu de condiments( tomates,épices, oignon, courgette,...) et aussi des arachides pour vendre. Cette brave dame est très accueillante, ce qui lui permet de maintenir sa clientèle. Après ses ventes, son bénéfice lui permettra d'augmenter le volume de son activité et aussi d'aider son époux à faire les dépenses de la famille.
texts.en: Ouinlassida, the representative member, is a married mother of four. This good and honest woman sells condiments and also grains. She has need of this loan to purchase some condiments (tomatoes, spices, onions, zucchini, …) and also peanuts to sell. This good and honest woman is very accommodating, thus allowing her to keep her customers. After her sales, her profit will enable her to increase her business volume and also to help out her husband in covering family expenses.

loans.use: to purchase peanuts and condiments to sell

loans.name: Kotognogontala 2 Group

texts.fr:
Les 10 membres du groupe  KOTOGNOGONTALA 2 sont des femmes mariées  ayant une moyenne d’âge de 47 ans, ont en moyenne 5 enfants et vivant la plupart dans des familles traditionnelles à N’Tjila dans le cercle de SIKASSO 3ème région administrative du MALI. 
Elles collaborent avec l’institution de microfinance Soro Yiriwaso afin de mener à bien leurs activités agricoles pendant l’hivernage. 
Elles sont à leur septième prêt de campagne avec l’institution de microfinance soroyiriwaso, les prêts antérieurs ont été bien remboursés.
La spéculation cultivée est l’arachide avec madame Safiatou assise en première position de la droite vers la gauche sur la photo. 
Avec son prêt, elle compte acheter 1 sac de 50 kg d’engrais, 1 bidon d’herbicide, payer les frais de labour pour entretenir  0,5 hectare. 
Après la récolte la production est vendue au niveau du village, à Niena et à  SIKASSO  à une clientèle composée d’hommes et de femmes au comptant et à crédit.
Elle compte réaliser un bénéfice moyen de 103 000 francs CFA par campagne.
Ce bénéfice lui permettra de payer son prêt et aussi d’aider son mari dans les dépenses quotidiennes.
texts.en:
The ten members of the group “KOTOGNOGONTALA 2” are married women, who average 47 years of age and five children each, living for the most part in traditional families in N’Tjila, in Cercle de SIKASSO (3rd administrative region of the Republic of Mali). The women are collaborating with the microfinance institution Soro Yiriwaso to carry out their farm work during the rainy season. They are now on their 7th loan with the institution; the past loans have indeed been paid back.  

The crop grown is peanuts, as is the case with Ms. Safiatou, who is sitting first from the right in the photo. With this loan, she intends to pay for a 50-kg sack of fertilizer, a container of herbicide, and plowing to maintain: 0.5 hectare.

After the harvest, the produce is sold to men and women customers paying with cash or credit, in Niena and in SIKASSO. She plans on making an average profit of 103,000 francs CFA per planting. This profit will enable her to pay back the loan and also to help out her husband in covering day-to-day expenses.

loans.use: to pay for fertilizer, herbicides, and plowing

loans.name: Benkadi  B Group

texts.fr:
Les  membres du groupe  BENKADI B  sont des femmes mariées  ayant une moyenne d’âge de 42 ans, 4 enfants et vivant toutes dans des  familles polygames à TIEGUEKOUROUNI, un des villages de BAYA, 3ème région administrative du Mali. 
Elles collaborent avec l’institution de microfinance Soro Yiriwaso afin de mener à bien leurs activités agricoles pendant l’hivernage. 
Elles sont à leur troisième prêt de campagne avec l’institution.
La spéculation cultivée est  l’arachide avec  MINATA, 3 éme personne debout de la  gauche  vers la  droite sur la photo.
Avec son prêt, elle compte acheter des intrants, des semences et payer les frais de labour pour entretenir  1 hectare. 
La production est vendue au niveau du marche, après la récolte à une clientèle composée de revendeurs et de consommateurs. 
Elle compte réaliser un bénéfice moyen de  195.000FCFA par campagne.
Ce bénéfice lui permettra de payer son prêt et aussi d’aider son mari dans les dépenses quotidiennes.
texts.en:
The members of the group “BENKADI B” are married women, who average 42 years of age and four children each, all living in polygamous families in TIEGUEKOUROUNI, a village of BAYA (3rd administrative region of the Republic of Mali). The women are collaborating with the microfinance institution Soro Yiriwaso to carry out their farm work during the rainy season. They are now on their 3rd farm loan with the institution.  

The crop grown is peanuts, as is the case with MINATA, standing third from the left in the photo. With this loan, she intends to pay for farm inputs, seeds, and plowing to maintain: 1 hectare.

After the harvest, the produce is sold to a customer base composed of retailers and consumers, at the market. She plans on making an average profit of 195,000 francs CFA per planting. This profit will enable her to pay back the loan and also to help out her husband in covering day-to-day expenses.

loans.use: to pay for plowing, farm inputs, and seeds

loans.name: Genaida

texts.en:
Genaida is 32 years old, married and has one child. To earn a living and help her husband provide for her child, she is engaged in a sari-sari store business and with the help of her husband as a fisherman, they can provide her child with a good life. Genaida aims for a better income; that's why she decided to avail a loan to buy more goods to sell and have more sales to create more income.

Genaida's plan for the future is to expand her business with her business income.

loans.use: To buy more goods to sell.

loans.name: Nema 2 Group

texts.fr: Ce groupe est constitué de trois femmes qui ont toujours remboursé leurs crédits sans difficultés. Madame Cécile qui est à la gauche de la photo levant la main est le représentant du groupe. Elle est veuve, âgée de 59 ans et mère de quatre enfants dont deux filles et deux garçons. Elle maitrise très bien son activité car elle capitalise plusieurs années d'expérience. Avec le crédit elle va acheter des légumes et des foulards qu'elle va vendre au comptant. les bénéfices vont servir à prendre en charge les dépenses quotidiennes et de renforcer ses épargnes.
texts.en: This group is composed of three women who always pay back their loans without a problem. Ms. Cécile, who is at the left in the photo with a hand raised, is the group's representative. She is a widow, 59 years old, and the mother of four children (2 girls and 2 boys). She has a great mastery of her business, since she capitalizes on several years of experience. With this loan, she is going to purchase some vegetables and scarves, which she will sell for cash. The profits will be used to cover day-to-day expenses and to bolster her savings.

loans.use: to purchase vegetables and scarves

loans.name: Armandine

texts.fr:
Armandine est une femme débrouillarde et travailleuse, elle a 39 ans. Elle est mariée et son mari est réparateur de réfrigérateur et congélateur et exerce aussi avec elle une activité d'achat et revente de frigo de seconde main. Ils ont quatre enfants dont trois sont scolarisés et l'ainé aide Armandine dans l'exercice de son activité. La famille habite ensemble dans sa propre maison.
Armandine dirige une poissonnerie depuis très long temps, depuis 1995. Elle est beaucoup attachée à son business au moins pour deux ou trois raisons, dit-elle. D'abord, l'approvisionnement ne lui est pas difficile car c'est sa sœur qui lui envoi directement les marchandises de la province, il n'y a aucun intermédiaire. Ensuite en cas de panne de matériaux, son mari est là pour la dépanner. Enfin, elle dit que sans être trop superstitieuse, cette activité là rend prospère. Elle voudrait encore, le développer et l'améliorer.
Maintenant son désire est de pouvoir ouvrir un petit restaurant que son ainé pourra diriger.
texts.en:
Armandine is a resourceful and hardworking woman. She is 39 years old and married. Her husband is a refrigerator and freezer repairman and also has a business with his wife buying and reselling used refrigerators. They have four children, of whom three are in school, and the oldest helps Armandine operate the business. The family lives together in its own house. 

Armandine has been managing a fish store for a long time, since 1995. She is very attached to her business for two or three reasons, at least, she says. First, getting supplies is not hard, since her sister sends her merchandise directly from the field; there is no middleman. Next, in case of an equipment problem, her husband is there to fix it. Finally, she says that, without being too superstitious, this business is making her prosperous. She would still like to develop and improve it. Now, her wish is to open a small restaurant, which her oldest child will be able to run.

loans.use: to purchase 350 kg of saltwater fish

loans.name: Rayim Taab-Yelé Group

texts.fr: Marie est la responsable de ce groupe de 6 membres. Elle est mariée et mère de 6 enfants. Cette femme battante vend du savon et de la pommade depuis 2 ans. Elle a besoin de ce prêt pour s'approvisionner en savon et en pommade pour vendre. Après ses ventes, elle aura un bénéfice qui lui permettra de renforcer son activité et aussi de faire les petites dépenses de ses enfants.
texts.en: Marie is the official of this group of six members. She is a married mother of six children. This determined woman has been selling soap and ointments for two years. She has need of this loan to stock up on soap and ointment to sell. After her sales, she will have a profit enabling her to bolster her business and also to cover the sundry expenses of her children.

loans.use: to purchase soap and ointments to sell

loans.name: Roem

texts.en:
Roem, 28, lives in a small community in Kampong Cham Province, Cambodia. He has one little child. To make a living he manages and operates a farming business, growing rice for sale and earns, on average, USD 5.00 a day. So far, he has been in this career for more than 10 years. 

He wants to improve the general living conditions of the entire family by having a latrine to use because there is no latrine in his house now. Therefore, he is borrowing a loan from Kiva to build a latrine. By doing this, he can help his family members gain access to sanitation, promote their health, and help to lessen environmental deterioration. He is thankful for the loan granted through HKL with a much lower interest rate than other general loan products.

loans.use: to build a latrine

loans.name: Benkadi  E Group

texts.fr:
Les  03 membres du groupe  BENKADI E  sont des femmes mariées  ayant une moyenne d’âge de 38 ans, 5 enfants et vivant toutes dans des  familles polygames à TIEGUEKOUROUNI, un des villages de BAYA, 3ème région administrative du Mali. 
Elles collaborent avec l’institution de microfinance Soro Yiriwaso afin de mener à bien leurs activités agricoles pendant l’hivernage. 
Elles sont à leur troisième prêt de campagne avec l’institution.
La spéculation cultivée est  l’arachide avec  FANTA SEKOU, au milieu sur la photo.
Avec son prêt, elle compte acheter des intrants, des semences et payer les frais de labour pour entretenir  1 hectare. 
La production est vendue au niveau du marche, après la récolte à une clientèle composée de revendeurs et de consommateurs. 
Elle compte réaliser un bénéfice moyen de  90.000FCFA par campagne.
Ce bénéfice lui permettra de payer son prêt et aussi d’aider son mari dans les dépenses quotidiennes.
texts.en:
The three members of the group “BENKADI E” are married women, who average 38 years of age and five children each, all living in polygamous families in TIEGUEKOUROUNI, a village of BAYA (3rd administrative region of the Republic of Mali). The women are collaborating with the microfinance institution Soro Yiriwaso to carry out their farm work during the rainy season. They are now on their 3rd farm loan with the institution.  

The crop grown is peanuts, as is the case with FANTA SEKOU, standing in the middle in the photo. With this loan, she intends to pay for farm inputs, seeds, and plowing to maintain: 1 hectare.

After the harvest, the produce is sold to a customer base composed of retailers and consumers, at the market. She plans on making an average profit of 90,000 francs CFA per planting. This profit will enable her to pay back the loan and also to help out her husband in covering day-to-day expenses.

loans.use: to pay for plowing, farm inputs, and seeds

loans.name: Liberito

texts.en:
Liberito is a father of five children at the age of 47. He is engaged in a sari-sari store to help his wife in providing their children's needs. He wants to give his family a good living. He decided to buy more goods to sell to be able to increase his store inventory and have more sales that will create a better income.

Liberito plans to save money from his business income to sustain the needs of his family.

loans.use: To buy more goods to sell.

loans.name: Sodia Group

texts.fr:
Les  8 membres du groupe  SODIA  sont des hommes mariées  ayant une moyenne d’âge de 47 ans, 5 enfants et vivant toutes dans des  familles traditionnelles à Tieguekourouni, un des villages de BAYA, 3ème région administrative du Mali. 
Ils  collaborent avec l’institution de microfinance Soro Yiriwaso afin de mener à bien leurs activités agricoles pendant l’hivernage. 
Ils  sont à leur deuxième prêt de campagne avec l’institution.
La spéculation cultivée est  le maïs avec  SAYON 1ére personne debout  de la  gauche vers la   droite sur la photo.
Avec son prêt, elle compte acheter des intrants, des semences et payer les frais de labour pour entretenir  1 hectare. 
La production est vendue au niveau du marche, après la récolte à une clientèle composée de revendeurs et de consommateurs. 
Il compte réaliser un bénéfice moyen de  195.000FCFA par campagne.
Ce bénéfice lui permettra de payer son prêt et les dépenses quotidiennes.
texts.en:
The eight members of the group “SODIA” are married men, who average 47 years of age and five children each, all living in traditional families in Tieguekourouni, a village of BAYA (3rd administrative region of the Republic of Mali). The men are collaborating with the microfinance institution Soro Yiriwaso to carry out their farm work during the rainy season. They are now on their 2nd farm loan with the institution.  

The crop grown is corn, as is the case with SAYON, standing first from the left in the photo. With this loan, he intends to pay for farm inputs, seeds, and plowing to maintain: 1 hectare.

After the harvest, the produce is sold to a customer base composed of retailers and consumers, at the market. He plans on making an average profit of 195,000 francs CFA per planting. This profit will enable him to pay back the loan and to cover day-to-day expenses.

loans.use: to pay for plowing, farm inputs, and seeds

loans.name: Jeanna  D'arc

texts.fr:
Jeanne d'Arc a 53 ans. Elle est mariée, et son époux est chauffeur de taxi-brousse régional. Ils ont un enfant qui est déjà marié et ne vit plus avec eux, déjà indépendant et autonome.
Depuis l'an 2000, Jeanne d'Arc exerce une activité de fabrication de pâtes alimentaires (pâtes jaune). Elle emploi deux hommes pour l'aider. 
Actuellement, elle transforme 3 sacs de 50kg de farine par jour pour obtenir 180kg de pâte, qu'elle arrive à liquider en une journée. Ses clients sont fixes: restaurateurs, simples revendeurs et gargotiers.
C'est une femme courageuse et vigoureuse et qui travaille dur. Son objectif est de développer et améliorer son activité pour qu'elle puisse gagner plus de bénéfice afin d'assurer sa retraite.
texts.en: Jeanne d'Arc is 53 years old and married. Her husband is a regional bush-taxi driver. They have a child who is already married, independent, autonomous, and no longer living with them. Since 2000, Jeanne d'Arc has been operating a business making pasta (yellow). She employs two men to help her. Currently, she processes three 50-kg sacks of flour per day to obtain 180 kg of pasta, which she manages to sell in one day. Her customers are fixed:  restauranteurs, retailers, and food stall owners.  This very courageous woman is full of energy and works hard. Her goal is to develop and improve her business, so that she may earn more profit, so as to ensure her retirement.

loans.use: to purchase some flour and a pasta machine

loans.name: Blada

texts.fr: Blada est une femme mariée qui vit à Baguida avec son enfant. Blada vend des produits cosmétiques et des mèches pour gagner son revenu et favoriser une éducation adéquate à son enfant. Grâce à cette activité, Blada arrive à faire une bonne épargne et tirer un bon profit de son activité. Blada s’approvisionne quatre fois par mois au marché local. Pour équiper son atelier, Blada demande ce prêt pour acheter des mèches, des tissages afin de de gagner son revenu et permettre une bonne éducation à son enfant.
texts.en: Blada is a married woman who lives in Baguida with her child. Blada sells cosmetic products and hair extensions to earn her income for the sake of an adequate education for her child. Thanks to her business, Blada manages to make a good profit and to save a good amount of money. She gets her supplies four times a month at the local market. To supply her shop, she is asking for this loan to purchase some hair extensions and weaves in order to earn an income and allow for a good education for her child.

loans.use: to purchase a dozen hair extensions and 18 packets of weaves

loans.name: Ofelia

texts.en:
Ofelia works hard to support her family. Ofelia is married and has a food vending business in the Philippines.

Ofelia requested a PHP 12000 loan through NWTF to buy ingredients for her food production business.

Ofelia has been in this business for 14 years now.

Ofelia would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her food production business

loans.name: Akos

texts.fr: Mariée et âgée de 32 ans, Akos est mère d’un enfant et habite à Adakpamé. Akos vend des produits de beauté dans le quartier et gagne son revenu grâce à ce commerce. Pour arriver à ses fins, Akos s’approvisionne cinq fois par mois. Pour commander des parfums, des poudre et pommades de beauté, Akos demande ce prêt pour réaliser son achat et disposer d’une marge bénéficiaire afin de subvenir favorablement aux besoins de ses enfants.
texts.en: Akos, aged 32, is a married mother of one child and lives in Adakpamé. Akos sells beauty products in her district and earns her income from this commerce. To reach her goals, she gets her supplies five times a month. To put in an order for perfumes, powders, and ointments, Akos is asking for this loan to realize her purchase and to have a profit margin for properly meeting the needs of her child.

loans.use: to purchase 15 perfumes, 4 ointments, and 5 cans of powder

loans.name: Peninah

texts.en:
Peninah is 30 years old. She is married and together with her husband they have been blessed with 2 children ages 10 years and 4 years respectively. 

She has had a school business for 7 years. She will be using the loan to purchase desks and other school facilities and hopes this will help her Invest in building rental houses.Her monthly income is KES 30,000.

Her hopes and dreams for the future are for her business to run well and make good profit in order to live a peaceful life and be financially stable.

loans.use: to purchase desks and other school facilities and hopes this will help her Invest in building rental houses

loans.name: Marcia

texts.en:
Marcia is 39 years old, is married and has three children who are in school.

Marcia is in the agricultural business of raising pigs in the Philippines. Marcia requested a PHP 8000 loan through NWTF to buy feeds and other supplies to raise her livestock.

Marcia has been in this business for 2 years now, and has borrowed 4 times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, Marcia would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy feeds and other supplies to raise her livestock

loans.name: Candelaria

texts.en:
Candelaria is 57 years old, is married and has four children with one child still in school.

Candelaria is in the agricultural business, pig fattening in the Philippines. Candelaria requested a PHP 12000 loan through NWTF to buy feeds and other supplies to raise her pigs.

Candelaria has been in pig fattening for 2 years now, and has borrowed 4 times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

Candelaria would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy feeds and other supplies to raise her pigs

loans.name: Allyn

texts.en:
Allyn is a married woman with two children who are in school. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Allyn is 31 years old. 

Allyn has a vegetable vending business in the Philippines. Allyn requested a PHP 10000 loan amount through NWTF to buy ingredients for her food production business.

Allyn has been in this business for 3 years. In the future, Allyn would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her food production business

loans.name: Edelyn

texts.en:
Edelyn is a 30 years old, married and has two children to support. To earn a living she engaged in a rice production business and is able to provide the daily needs for her children. She aims for a better living for her family. That is why she decided to borrow a loan to purchase fertilizer for her rice field,  which will result in a good harvest with more stocks of rice to sell.

Edelyn wants for the future to buy a vehicle to deliver her rice stocks in the market.

loans.use: To purchase fertilizer for the rice field.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase farm inputs such as fertilizers and maize seeds for planting so as to get a better harvest for sale in the market and family use.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to improve her farming activity through the use of a greenhouse.

loans.name: M.r Group

texts.en:
May is the featured borrower of M.R group. She got together with the other group members to acquire a loan from Kiva's field partner Al Majmoua, because they have always been neighbors and work hard to develop their living.

May is the lady on the far left side of the picture. She is a 49-year-old single lady who decided five years ago to open her own clothes-selling business after she acquired wide experience in this domain from being an employee in a clothes-selling shop for 15 years. Currently she has 20 years of experience, good enough to acquire a wide talent and a good number of customers who come to her shop based on her previous relationship.
,
Since May's shop is considered newly established, she is working hard to develop it as much as she can. Thus, for this reason, she is acquiring a loan from Kiva's field partner Al Majmoua in order to increase her business merchandise with a special summer collection to attract her customers' attention.
As for the other group members, Rima is the first on the right, while Souha is the lady at the center.

loans.use: To increase her business merchandise with a special summer collection to attract customers' attention

loans.name: Angeles

texts.en:
Angeles works hard to support her family. She is widowed with six children and has a fish vending business in the Philippines.

Angeles requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more fish to sell and other materials for her business. She has been in this business for 20 years now.

She would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more fish to sell and other materials for her business

loans.name: Marife

texts.en:
Marife is 45 years old, married and has seven children to feed. To earn a living, and with the help of her husband as a fishermen, she is engaged in a rice retailing business as one of her sources of income. She wants to gain a better income so she decided to borrow a loan to buy more stock to sell and have more sales to create more income.

Marife's plan for the future is to expand her business using her business income.

loans.use: To buy more stocks to sell.

loans.name: Valeriana

texts.en:
Valeriana is a widowed woman with five children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. Valeriana is 50 years old now.

Valeriana has a buy and sell of personal care products business in the Philippines. Valeriana requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to buy more items to sell like shampoo, lotion, etc.

Valeriana has been in this business for 10 years. In the future, Valeriana would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more items to sell like shampoo, lotion, etc.

loans.name: Irenea

texts.en:
Irenea is 58 years old and married with six children. She works very hard to provide for them.

Irenea runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 12,000 loan through NWTF to buy additional items like canned goods, cereals, detergent soap, shampoo, soft drinks, etc. to sell.

Irenea has been in this business for three years and sells a variety of items such as canned goods, cereals, detergent soap, shampoo, soft drinks, etc. 

Irenea would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy additional items like canned goods, cereals, detergent soap, shampoo, and soft drinks to sell

loans.name: Josephine

texts.en:
Josephine is a married woman with four children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. Josephine is 57 years old and one of her children is still in school.

Josephine has a general store business in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 20,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more stock to sell in her general store.

Josephine has been in this business for nine years. Josephine would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase more stock to sell in her general store

loans.name: Maria Estita Sajulan

texts.en:
Maria Estita Sajulan is 53 years old and widowed. She works very hard to provide for them.

Maria Estita Sajulan runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 8,000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell like beverages, home care products and other groceries.

Maria Estita Sajulan has been in this business for 10 years. 

In the future, she would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy items to sell like beverages, home care products and other groceries

loans.name: Julieta

texts.en:
As a married parent of two children, Julieta works hard to support her family.

She has a seedlings business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from farming and selling vegetables.  Julieta is borrowing PHP 20000 through NWTF to buy fertilizers and other supplies for her business.

Julieta has been sustaining her business activities through her past 7 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and other supplies for her business

loans.name: Concepcion

texts.en:
Concepcion is 58 years old and married with six children.

Concepcion works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 18,000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell like canned goods, home care products and other groceries.

Concepcion has borrowed and repaid five loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for eight years and also earns an income from raising pigs.

Concepcion aspires to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy items to sell like canned goods, home care products and other groceries

loans.name: Lampai's Group

texts.en:
Lampai, 28, is the mother of a young child and she lives in Battambang province. The sources of her family’s income are from growing rice and selling grocery items, which they have been doing for five years. She makes about 48,900 KHR per day in daily income to support her family’s living costs. 

Due to a lack of funds for her farming, she is now leading a group of four to take out their first Kiva loan via VisionFund. As the group leader, she will use her loan portion to buy seeds, fertilizer and pesticide for her farming. 

Lampai hopes to earn more money to improve her family’s standard of living, and to be able to keep sending her child to school.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizer and pesticide for her farming

loans.name: Cristy

texts.en:
Cristy is a 36-year-old married woman with three children, two of whom are still in school. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. 

Cristy has a food vending business in the Philippines. She has requested a PHP 8,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy ingredients like banana, cooking oil, sugar, etc. and additional utensils for her food production business. She has been in this business for 5 years. 

She would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy ingredients like banana, cooking oil, sugar, etc. and additional utensils for her food production business

loans.name: Sarun

texts.en:
Sarun, aged 40, is originally from Kampong Cham Province, and she is the mother of six children. 

Sarun is a pork-seller and earns on average USD 5 per day. She lives a little bit far from the water source so it is hard and time consuming for her to get water. For this reason, she is applying for a Kiva loan to dig a well for household use. With the support of this loan, she hopes that she can get water to use more easily and more quickly than before. 

Sarun is thankful to the lenders for their financial support towards poor people.

loans.use: to dig a well

loans.name: Améyo

texts.fr: Améyo est une femme mariée de 41 ans et très entreprenante. Améyo vit à Adakpamé avec cinq enfants à sa charge. Améyo travaille activement pour leur favoriser une bonne éducation. Pour cela Améyo vend de la boisson locale dans son quartier pour trouver le revenu nécessaire. Améyo s’approvisionne trois fois par mois marché. Pour commander des boissons, Améyo demande ce crédit pour financer son activité et réaliser plus de profits pour élever ses enfants avec épanouissement.
texts.en:
Ameyo is a very enterprising 41-year-old married woman. Ameyo lives in Adakpame with five children to support. She actively works to provide them with a good education.

To generate the income needed for that purpose Ameyo sells local drinks in her neighborhood. She resupplies three times a month at the market.

Ameyo is requesting this credit so she can order drinks, finance her activities, generate more profits and help her children achieve their full potential.

loans.use: buy 80 bottles of beverages

loans.name: Junalita

texts.en:
As a married parent of three children, Junalita works hard to support her family.

She has a food vending business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from a general store. She is borrowing PHP 12,000 through NWTF to purchase ingredients like meat, fish, noodles, rice, vegetables, etc. for her food vending business.

Junalita has been sustaining her business activities through her past 3 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her to attain her dream, which is to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase ingredients like meat, fish, noodles, rice, vegetables, etc. for her food production business

loans.name: Carmelita

texts.en:
Carmelita is 26 years old with two children. With one of her children in school, Carmelita works very hard to provide for them.

Carmelita runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 5,000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell like canned goods, home care products and other groceries.

Carmelita has been in this business for two years. 

In the future, Carmelita would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy items to sell like canned goods, home care products and other groceries

loans.name: Kayi

texts.fr: Kayi est une femme mariée qui est âgée de 46 ans et vit à Baguida avec trois enfants à sa charge. Kayi est une couturière qui vend des habits fait de pagnes à ses clients d’avoir le bénéfice afin de subvenir aux besoins de ses enfants. Kayi s’approvisionne quatre fois par mois au marché. Pour  commander des pièces de pagne, Kayi demande ce crédit pour financer son achat et avoir une bonne marge bénéficiaire pour réaliser ses attentes et permettre une bonne éducation à ses enfants.
texts.en:
Kayi is a 46-year-old married woman who lives in Baguida with three dependent children.

Kayi is a seamstress who sells clothes  made from pagnes (colorful West-African fabric) to her clients, so she can generate sufficient profits to provide for her children She resupplies four times monthly at the market.

Kavi is requesting this loan so she can order pagnes, finance her purchase and have good profit margins, so she can achieve her expectations and provide a good education for her children.

loans.use: buy four lengths of pagnes (colorful West-African fabric)

loans.name: Goussivi

texts.fr: Divorcée et âgé de 36 ans, Goussivi est une femme très entreprenante et active dans la gestion de ses besoins. Avec deux enfants à charge, Goussivi habite à Adidogomé pour vendre de la pate bandée et des poissons frits pour la restauration de ses clients. Ce commerce lui apporte son bénéfice et Goussivi s’approvisionne quatre fois par mois auprès de ses fournisseurs. Pour acheter des bols de maïs et des poissons, Goussivi demande ce crédit pour financer sa commande et réaliser assez de profit pour répondre favorablement aux besoins de ses enfants.
texts.en:
A 36-year-old divorcee, Goussivi is a very enterprising woman, active in managing her needs.

With two children to care for, she lives in Adidogome where she sells maize mush and fried fish to nourish her customers. This trade generates her income and she resupplies four times a month from her suppliers.

To purchase bowls of maize and fish, Goussivi is requesting this loan to finance her order and make enough profit so she can respond positively to her children's needs.

loans.use: buy 20 bowls of maize and six kilos of fish

loans.name: Frecilita

texts.en:
Frecilita is a married woman with two children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. Frecilita is 39 years old and one of her children is still in school.

Frecilita has a buy and sell of frozen foods business in the Philippines. Frecilita requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more frozen food products and other materials for her business.

Frecilita has been in this business for four years. She would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase more frozen food products and other materials for her business

loans.name: Hayde

texts.en:
Hayde is a single woman with two children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. Hayde is 33 years old and both of her children are still in school.

Hayde has a fish vending business in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more fish and other materials for her business.

Hayde has been in this business for 15 years. She would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase more fish and other materials for her business

loans.name: Flora

texts.en:
Flora is a married woman with five children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. Flora is 44 years old and two of her children are currently in school.

Flora has a buy and sell of ready to wear clothing business in the Philippines. Flora requested a PHP 10,000 loan amount through NWTF to purchase additional items like shirts, pants, etc. to sell to her customers.

Flora has been in this business for three years. In the future, Flora would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase additional items like shirts and pants to sell to her customers

loans.name: Samwel

texts.en:
Samwel is 28 years old and supports four members in the family.

He is married and blessed with one child.

He has been selling retail goods for four years earning an income of KES 15,000.

He will use the money borrowed to buy more stock of retail household goods.

He will use the profit to pay school fees and expand his business to become a wholesaler.

loans.use: to add to his stock of retail household goods

loans.name: Xavier

texts.pt:
Pai de 43 anos de idade, tem 7ªclasse, vive na casa própria, pai de 4 filhos menores 2 com acesso a escola, é trabalhador de uma empresa de segurança, como guarda nocturno mas também é serralheiro e presta serviços por conta própria na zona de forma a  aumentar os seus rendimentos. Esta a repetir o credito e com o primeiro investiu na construção de sua casa e pretende dar continuidade.
Pretende comprar material de construção como: cimento, areia, pedra, ferros, etc,
Seu maior desejo é ver sua obra terminada, continuar a por seus filhos a estudarem em condições dignas bem como beneficiar-se de mais créditos.
O custo de vida para ele é alto e seu rendimento é bastante baixo para fazer face a tantos projectos de vida que tem.
texts.en: Xavier is a 43 year old father to 4 young children, 2 of whom are currently attending school, and he lives in his own home. Educated to 7th grade level, he now works as a night watchman for a security company and, to raise his income level further, he also runs his own local locksmith business. He invested his first loan in building his own home and now he is applying for a second loan which he will use to continue with the building work. He plans to buy materials such as cement, sand, stone and iron building rods, etc. His greatest wishes are to see his house completed so that he can continue to offer his children good conditions in which to study and to apply for further loans as the cost of living is high and his income is too low to allow him to complete all of the projects that he has in mind.

loans.use: to buy cement, sand, stone and iron building rods

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy cement, sand and stone to finish the building work on her home.

loans.name: Aida

texts.pt:
A Sra Alda tem 62 anos de idade, casada, mãe de 02 filhos maiores de idade e independentes, isto é, estão nas suas casas, porém, sustenta 01 neto que frequenta o ensino primário.
Tem uma Mercearia no seu quintal e com o financiamento de 20.000,00mts pretende reforçar o seu negócio comprando produtos tais como: arroz, vinagre, feijao, peixe carrapau, refrescos e cerveja para revender e sonha em ter uma loja bem grande que tenha todo tipo de produtos, todavia, para alcançar o seu sonho, tem o desafio de trabalhar arduamente, pese embora enfrenta dificuldades financeiras.
texts.en:
Alda is a 62 year old, married mother to 2 grown-up children who already live independently in their own homes. However, she is financially responsible for her grandson who attends primary school.
Alda runs a grocery store from her backyard and she plans to use this loan for MZN20,000 to restock her business, buying items such as rice, vinegar, beans, mackerel, soft drinks and beer to resell. She dreams of setting up a large shop from which she would be able to sell a full range of items but, in order to achieve this aim, she faces the challenge of working arduously and she finds it difficult when she then encounters financial problems.

loans.use: to buy rice, vinegar, beans, mackerel, soft drinks and beers.

loans.name: Adriana Maria

texts.es:
Adriana es una mujer de experiencia, sabiduría y mucha paciencia.
Es madre de 3 hijos y ha trabajado prácticamente toda su vida para sacarlos adelante.

Ella tiene una pequeño negocio en el que vende comidas rápidas que ella misma prepara. 
Trabaja todos los días de 5:00 Am  a 3:00 Pm para tener su producto listo y fresco para sus clientes que en su mayoría son los vecinos del sector donde vive.

Ella desea capitalizar su negocio y tener un gran avance de insumos e inventario de productos, por eso acude a un préstamo para comprar surtido de bebidas y frituras, además desea comprar insumos para su producción de alimentos.

Una de sus principales dificultades es la falta de dinero para invertir en su negocio pero confía en la ayuda de la Corporación Interactuar y el buen corazón de los prestamistas de Kiva para sacar su actividad adelante.
texts.en:
Adriana is a woman of experience, wisdom and a lot of patience. She is the mother of 3 children and has worked practically all of her life to support them. She has a small business where she sells fast food that she prepares herself. She works every day from 5:00 A.M. to 3:00 P.M. to have her product ready and fresh for her clients, who are mostly neighbors from the area she lives in. 
She wishes to capitalize on her business and have a breakthrough of supplies and product inventory. For this reason, she is turning to a loan to buy a variety of drinks and chips. She also wishes to buy supplies for her food production. One of her main difficulties is lack of money to invest in her business but she trusts in the help of the Corporación Interactuar and the good hearts of the Kiva loaners to provide for her business.

loans.use: to buy a variety of drinks and chips. She also wishes to buy supplies for her food production.

loans.name: Roberto Emilio

texts.es:
Es señor Roberto es un agricultor muy habilidoso con experiencia en varias áreas de la agricultura, con un talento innato para el trabajo en equipo y una gran mente emprendedora.

Tiene un cultivo de frijol que atiende todos los días desde muy tempranas horas de la mañana.

Actualmente vive con su esposa y sus tres hijos por los cuales ha tratado de luchar siempre para sacarlos adelante.

El desea darle un impulso a su cultivo y obtener mejores ingresos de este por eso pide un auxilio económico para invertirlo en insumos agropecuarios como pesticidas, abonos y semillas de frijol, el préstamo le dará la oportunidad de tener un producto de mejor calidad.

Su mayor sueño es tener una casa propia y brindarle a sus hijos un buen futuro!
texts.en:
Roberto is a very crafty farmer with experience in various agricultural areas. He has an innate talent working with equipment and a great entrepreneurial mind. He has a bean crop that he attends to every day from very early hours in the morning. Currently, he lives with his wife and his three children, for whom he has always tried to fight for to provide for them.  
He wants to give his crops a boost and get a better income as a result, so he is asking for economic aid to invest in agricultural supplies such as pesticides, fertilizers and bean seeds. The loan will give him the opportunity to have a better quality product. His biggest dream is to have his own home and give his children a good future.

loans.use: to invest in agricultural supplies such as pesticides, fertilizers and bean seeds.

loans.name: Angel Enrique

texts.es:
Laborioso y soñador, son dos palabras que describen perfectamente a Angel, un hombre trabajador y de familia, que hace lo que este a su alcance para ofrecerles una mejor calidad de vida a sus hijos y esposa.

Se dedica a la cría y venta de cerdos en el municipio de Momil.
Esta es una actividad muy común en esta región y gran parte de sus habitantes la practican.

El posee gran conocimiento en esta materia y considera que necesita un pequeño impulso para incrementar sus ventas y aumentar su negocio, es por esta razón que solicita un auxilio económico para invertirlo en la compra de cerdos y materiales para el mantenimiento del corral donde alberga sus animales.

Con este préstamo podrá continuar con su actividad que es la única fuente de ingresos de su familia.

Se siente agradecido con los prestamistas de Kiva y con la Corporación Interactuar que hacen posible que su negocio crezca y mejore.
texts.en:
Hard working and a dreamer are two things that perfectly describe Angel. A hard working and family man who does what he can to give a better quality of life to his children and his wife.

He earns a living raising and selling pigs in the Momil municipality.
This is a very common activity in this region and a large part of the inhabitants do it.

He has a lot of knowledge in this area and he thinks that he needs a little push to increase his sales and expand his business. This is why he is asking for financial help to invest in buying pigs and materials for maintaining the pen where he keeps his animals.

With this loan he will be able to continue with this work which is the sole form of income for his family.

He feels grateful to the Kiva lenders and to Interactuar who make it possible for his business to grow and improve.

loans.use: to buy pigs and materials for maintaining the pen where he keeps his animals.

loans.name: Ivette Carolina

texts.es:
Ivette es una mujer trabajadora, emprendedora y perseverante. Desde hace unos años inició una pulpería en su vivienda y gracias al último financiamiento de MiCrédito pudo comprar productos que le sirvieron para ofrecer mayor variedad, asimismo pudo incrementar sus ganancias. De esta forma ella aporta a la economía de su hogar.  

Por ello, solicita un nuevo crédito para comprar gaseosas, golosinas, granos básicos, papel higiénico, aceite, jabones, desodorantes y productos de temporada. Que le servirá para surtir su pulpería   y aumentar sus ganancias. Ella planea hacer otro préstamo para ampliar su negocio y comprar una vivienda.
texts.en:
Ivette is a hardworking, entrepreneurial and persevering woman. A few years ago she started a grocery store in her home and thanks to her last funding from MiCrédito she was able to buy products that helped her to offer a wider variety and she was also able to increase her earnings. In this way she contributes to her family finances.

Therefore, she is asking for a new loan to buy soft drinks, sweets, basic grains, toilet paper, oil, soaps, deodorants and seasonal products. This will help her to stock up her grocery store and increase her income. She plans to apply for another loan to expand her business and to buy a home.

loans.use: to buy soft drinks, sweets, basic grains, toilet paper, oil, soaps, deodorants and seasonal products.

loans.name: Porfirio

texts.es:
Porfirio está casado con Irma con quien tienen 7 hijos a sus 65 años Porfirio sigue siendo el líder de la familia y la economía de su familia depende de sus cafetales que actualmente se han visto seriamente afectados por las plagas y  la edad por lo que Porfirio ve un buena oportunidad para replantar sus cafetales y convertirlos a producción orgánica, Porfirio sueña con poder dejarles un pequeño patrimonio a sus 7 hijos para que no tengan que pasar por las duras situaciones que el ah tenido que pasar. 
La producción de café orgánico es algo novedoso en la región ya que ayuda proteger la biodiversidad de la región y a optar a mejores mercados para el café, con las ganancias de su producción Porfirio espera poder tener una mejor calidad de vida con toda su familia.
Porfirio esta alegre ya que ve una oportunidad en el deterioro de sus cafetales para hacer algo bueno para todos, es por eso que él está solicitando un crédito para replantar y certificar 1.5 hectáreas con el crédito el comprara todos los materiales necesarios para la replantación.
Un crédito ayudaría a Porfirio a tener mejores oportunidades  de mercado para su café y al mismo tiempo a mejorar su calidad de vida con las ganancias del producto orgánico vendido.
texts.en:
Porfirio is married to Irma and they have seven children. At 65 years old, Porfirio continues to be the leader of the family and the economy of his family depends on his coffee plantation that has now been seriously affected by pests and age. Porfirio sees this as a good opportunity to replant the plantation and convert it to an organic production. Porfirio dreams of leaving his children a small estate so they don't have to go through the tough situations he has been through.

The production of organic coffee is something new in the region, it helps protect the biodiversity and qualify for better markets for coffee. With the production gains, Porfirio hopes to have a better quality of life with his family.

Porfirio is cheerful and sees an opportunity in the deterioration of his plantation to do something good for everybody. This is why he is requesting a loan to replant and certify 1.5 hectares. With the loan he will pay for all materials necessary for replantation. The loan will help Porfirio to have better market opportunities for his coffee while improving the quality of life with the earnings from the organic products sold.

loans.use: to buy coffee plants, organic fertilizer, other organic inputs, and pay for manual labor necessary to replant and certify organic 1.5 hectares of coffee plantation.

loans.name: Paz

texts.es:
Paz, de 41 años de edad, es un agricultor muy trabajador, no estudio, está acompañado, su pareja se dedica a los oficios domésticos y a elaborar petates y tiene 3 hijos de los cuales 2 asisten a la escuela. 

Paz, a pesar que tuvo un accidente que lo dejó incapacitado de su brazo derecho, ha logrado salir adelante con su familia, ya que con mucho esfuerzo cultiva sus parcelas de maíz.

Él, necesita el crédito para comprar fertilizantes y pagar mano de obra que le ayuda a sembrar.

Sus sueños son, mejorar sus condiciones de vida y de él y de su familia y lograr que sus hijos tengan un nivel académico considerable, para que opten por un buen trabajo.
texts.en:
Paz is 41 years old. He is a hard working farmer. He has not studied, he is married and his partner looks after the household tasks and makes mats out of palm leaves. He has three children and two of them go to school.

Despite having an accident which left him unable to use his right arm, Paz has managed to get ahead with his family as he farms his corn plots with a lot of effort.

He needs a loan to buy fertilisers and to pay for labour to help him to sew seeds.

His dreams are to improve his living conditions and those of his family and to give his children a significant level of education so that they can get a good job.

loans.use: to buy fertilisers and to pay for labour to help him sew seeds.

loans.name: Fredy Alexander

texts.es:
Con su gran manera de trabajar, su amor por sus hijos, su convicción de salir adelante y la fe que tiene en sus sueños, Freddy ha tenido la fortaleza para trabajar en su finca con la cría de cerdos.

Esta es una actividad que le ha dado muchas oportunidades y que le ha permitido darle un sustento digno a su familia.

Hoy en día sus animales necesitan un lugar mejor para albergarlos, es por ello que solicita un préstamo para comprar los materiales necesarios para la construcción de una marranera, además necesita comprar más cerdos.

Con el apoyo del crédito podrá comprar estos materiales y es por eso que busca ayuda en los prestadores de kiva y en el apoyo de Interactuar.

Freddy espera tu colaboración para mejorar su calidad de vida y la de sus hijos!
texts.en:
With his hard work, love for his children, his conviction to move forward and the faith in his dreams, Fredy has had the fortitude to work in his farm raising pigs.

This is an activity that has provided many opportunities and has allowed him to provide a dignified living for his family.

Today his animals need a better place to shelter, and it is for that reason he is requesting a loan to buy the necessary materials to construct a pig pen, and he also needs to buy more pigs.

With the help of the loan he will be able to buy these materials, and for that reason he is seeking help from the lenders of Kiva and the help of Interactuar.

Fredy hopes for your collaboration to improve his quality of life and that of his children!

loans.use: to buy the materials necessary for the construction of a pig pen, as well as to buy more pigs.

loans.name: Maria

texts.pt:
A Sra Maria, tem 49 anos de idade, solteira e mãe de 05 filhos dos quais 03 estão na sua responsabilidade e os 02 são maiores de idade e s~ao independentes.
Cria frangos há mais de 05 anos, para além de criar, tem uma mercearia no seu quintal. Com o empréstimo de 45.000,00mts, pretende comprar pintos, vitaminas e ração para dar continuidade na sua criação.
Ela sonha em desenvolver cada vez mais o seu negócio e o seu desafio é reembolsar o empréstimo dentro do prazo acordado.
texts.en:
Maria is 49 years old, single, and has five children. Three of them depend on her and the rest are independent adults.

She has been raising chickens for more than five years. She has a grocery store in her backyard. With the loan of 45,000 Mts, she plans to buy chickens, vitamins and animal feed in order to continue with her activity.

She dreams of developing her business every day more and her challenge is to pay back the loan according to plan.

loans.use: to buy chickens, vitamins and animal feed.

loans.name: Juan Camilo

texts.es:
Juan con 21 años de edad es soltero. Toda su vida fue criado en el campo, donde ha realizado actividades agropecuarias la mayor parte de su vida.  

Actualmente posee cultivos de frijol y complementa con la producción de leche, de algunas vacas que son de su propiedad, tanto la cosecha de plátano, como los litros de leche que ordeña a diarios, son vendidos en el mercado de Guarne, así logra obtener los recursos suficientes para llevar el sustento diario a su hogar. 

Juan es un joven serio, responsable, comprometido con su familia y su trabajo, por ello siempre quiere seguir avanzando es busca de un futuro mejor, por esta razón solicita un crédito para invertirlo en la compra de insumos agrícolas como abonos, fertilizantes, pesticidas con el fin de continuar con el cuidado de sus cultivos y poder sacar una cosecha en óptimas condiciones; todo esto le ayudará a seguir adelante, mejorando poco a poco su nivel de vida.

Haz que los sueños de Juan Se hagan realidad con un préstamo hoy!
texts.en:
Juan is 21 years old and is single. All of his life he was raised in the countryside where he has partaken in agricultural activities for the majority of his life. Currently, he has crops of beans and he compliments these with the production of milk from a few cows that he owns. He also sells his harvest of bananas, along with the liters of milk that he obtains daily, at the market in Guarne so he can obtain sufficient resources to provide daily sustenance for his household.

Juan is a serious young man who is responsible and committed to his family and his work. He always wants to continue advancing in search of a better future. This is the reason why he is seeking a loan to invest in the purchase of agricultural supplies such as manure, fertilizers and pesticides with the goals of continuing to care for his crops and collecting a harvest in optimal conditions. All of this will help him to get ahead and improve little by little his standard of living. 

Make the dreams of Juan become a reality with a loan today!

loans.use: to purchase agricultural supplies such as manure, fertilizers and pesticides with the goal of continuing to care for his crops.

loans.name: Salomon

texts.es:
Salomon encuentra en sus pollos esa oportunidad que siempre ha soñado de poder pagar una educación de calidad para sus hijos y tener el sustento diario para sobrevivir.

Hoy en día se siente muy orgulloso de lo que ha podido construir hasta ahora gracias a su dedicación, esfuerzo y trabajo duro.

Solicita un crédito para compra los materiales necesarios para la adecuación del galpón de sus pollos, además de comprar algunos pollos para la cría y gallinas ponedoras.

Es una actividad realizada con todo el cariño y empeño que solo un 
padre puede tener.
Anímate a prestar al negocio de Salomon!
texts.en:
Salomon finds in his poultry business the opportunity he always dreamed of: being able to give his children access to good education and having enough to survive every day.

He feels very proud today of what he has accomplished so far thanks to his dedication, persistence and hard work.

He is requesting a loan to buy the materials he needs to repair his chicken pens, and to buy broilers and laying hens.

He is dedicated and works hard for his business, like only a father can do it.

Come on and lend to Salomon’s business!

loans.use: to buy the materials he needs to repair his chicken pens, and to buy broilers and laying hens.

loans.name: Angy Paola

texts.es:
Angy es una mujer muy emprendedora y tenaz, con grandes deseos que ha estado cultivando y tratando de cumplir.

Tiene un pequeño negocio de preparación y venta de alimentos, en pocas palabras un pequeño restaurante.

Con esta actividad intenta día a día  salir adelante y mejorar las condiciones de vida de su familia quienes son el motor de su vida y su motivación para luchar diariamente.

Su mayor dificultad es la competencia del sector, pero con su gran capacidad de trabajo es capaz de sostenerse y progresar.

Angy solicita un préstamo para realizar la compra de insumos como lechones para su preparación y venta en su restaurante.

Con tu ayuda Angy Podrá aumentar su surtido y mejorar su negocio!
texts.en:
Angy is a very enterprising and tenacious woman, with big dreams which she is growing and trying to realize.

She has a small business of the preparation and sale of food: a small restaraunt.

With this employment she tries each day to move forward and improve the conditions of her lives of her family, who are the driving force in her life and her motivation to fight every day.

Her biggest difficulty is the competition in this sector, but with her great capacity for work she is capable of sustaining herself and progressing.

Angy is asking for a loan to buy consumables such as suckling pig for preparation and selling in her restaraunt.  

With your help Angy will be able to increase her stock and improve her business!

loans.use: to buy consumables such as suckling pigs for preparation and selling in her restaraunt

loans.name: Sara Fernanda

texts.es:
Sara es una persona que ha tenido que atravesar muchas adversidades en su vida, sin embargo siempre ha tenido la fortaleza para superarlas y salir adelante. 

Hace aproximadamente 5 años inició desesperadamente la búsqueda de una fuente de ingresos para su hogar. Fue así como inició la cría y venta de pollos, negocio que le ha venido generando ganancias con las cuales puede sostener los gastos de su hogar. 

Sara busca que un préstamo le brinde la posibilidad de acceder a la compra de gallinas ponedoras. Sabe que con la ayuda de la Corporación Interactuar puede lograrlo.

Sara tiene la esperanza en que el préstamo le permita salir adelante con su negocio. 

Además, espera que su negocio crezca y genere mayores ingresos con los cuales les pueda ofrecer a sus hijos una mejor calidad de vida y mayores oportunidades de progreso. 

Con un préstamo que hagas hoy podrás mejorar la vida y el negocio de Sara!
texts.en:
Sara is a person who has had to go through many difficulties in life. However she has always has the strength to overcome them and to progress.

About approximately five years ago she desperately began the search for a source of income for her household. This was how she started raising and selling chickens, a business that has generated earnings with which she can pay for the household expenses.

Sara is looking for a loan to bring her the possibility of buying laying hens. She knows that with the help of Interactuar she can manage it.

Sara hopes that the loan will allow her to progress with her business.

Furthermore, she hopes that her business will grow and with create better earnings with which she can offer her children a better quality of life and more opportunities to progress.

With a loan you make today you could improve Sara's life and business!

loans.use: to buy laying hens. She knows that with the help of Interactuar she can manage it.

loans.name: Jorge Alberto

texts.es:
Jorge, un hombre de 28 años de edad lleno de sueños y aspiraciones en su vida, vive en una finca en el municipio de Caparrapi y se gana la vida con la producción y venta de pollos y huevos.  

Con este trabajo intenta sostener a su familia compuesta por su esposa y 3 hijos.

Es un trabajo que ha venido ejerciendo desde hace unos meses con el fin de salir adelante.

Pide un apoyo económico para la compra de pollos, gallinas ponedoras, alimento y materiales para su galpón.

Con este préstamo podrá tener un negocio más sostenible y consolidado.

Con un préstamo que hagas hoy podrás mejorar la vida y el negocio de Jorge!
texts.en: Jorge is a 28 year old man who is full of dreams and aspirations for his life. He lives on a parcel of land in the municipality of Caparrapi and he makes a living from the production and sale of chickens and eggs. Through this work he intends to support his family which is composed of his wife and three children. This is work that he has been performing for a few months with the goal of getting ahead. He is seeking economic support to purchase chickens, laying hens, food and materials for his barn. With this loan he will be able to have business that is more sustainable and secure. With this loan that you can make today you will improve the business and life of Jorge!

loans.use: to purchase chickens, laying hens, food and materials for his barn.

loans.name: Seferino

texts.es:
Seferino, de 51 años de edad, no estudio, pero aprendió a leer porque asiste a clases nocturnas, está acompañado, su pareja se dedica a los oficios domésticos y a lavar ropa ajena, tiene 4 hijos, los cuales están estudiando.  

Seferino, necesita el crédito para comprar insumos agrícolas para sembrar maíz y pagar mano de obra para que le ayuden a sembrar.

Sus sueños, son sacar a sus hijos adelante y también obtener buena cosecha del cultivo.
texts.en:
Seferino, 51 years old, didn't study but learned to read because he attends night classes. He is in a relationship; his partner works in the household chores and washing clothes for others. He has 4 children who are studying.

Seferino needs the loan to buy agricultural inputs to plant corn and pay workforce to help him sow.

His dreams are helping his children move forward and also getting good crop harvest.

loans.use: to buy agricultural inputs to plant corn and to pay workforce.

loans.name: Luis Manuel

texts.es:
Luis, de 36 años, está en un negocio de construcción y reformas de viviendas en el municipio de El Carmen De Viboral, negocio que empezó el afán de sostener a su hija y ofrecerles una mejor calidad de vida.

En el momento en que nació su hija, encontró su motivación para trabajar incansablemente y así ofrecerle lo mejor para su vida y desarrollo.

Hoy en día se han convertido en la alegría de este hombre trabajador.

Solicita un préstamo para la compra de herramientas de construcción para iniciar con una obra.

Con este préstamo podrá sostener a su hija y a su esposa brindándoles una mejor oportunidad de progreso a través de su trabajo.

Apoya a Luis con un préstamo para que pueda continuar con su actividad!
texts.en:
Luis is 36 years old. He is in a construction and remodeling business in the town of El Carmen De Viboral. He started this business in order to support his daughter and offer her a better quality of life.

The moment his daughter was born, he found his motivation to work tirelessly to giver her the best for her life and development. Today she has become this working man's happiness. 

He is asking for a loan to buy construction tools to start a construction project. With this loan , he will be able to support his daughter and wife and offer them better opportunities to progress through their work.   

Support Luis with a loan so he can continue with his activity!

loans.use: to buy construction tools to start a construction job.

loans.name: Maria Francisca

texts.es:
Francisca, de 53 años de edad, estudio hasta segundo grado, está casada, su pareja se dedica a trabajar en construcciones, tiene 4 hijos, pero todos están acompañados, aunque una de sus hijas vive en el mismo terreno donde vive ella, sus nietos casi solo en su casa pasan. 

Francisca, se dedica desde hace 20 años a criar ganado, pues le gusta mucho porque no le falta la leche, el queso y la cuajada; todo lo que sabe lo ha aprendido de sus padres, pues ellos tenían ganado.- Además, se dedica a atender una pequeña tienda, de donde también obtiene ingresos. 

El dinero del crédito lo necesita para comprar un toro, pues tiene vacas y quiere incrementar su hato ganadero, porque cuando quiere que una de sus vacas quede embarazada, tiene que llevarlas donde el toro de sus vecinos y por la edad que tiene se le hace muy difícil.

Ella, sueña con tener más animales y poder emplear a más personas para que cuiden el ganado; también desea surtir su tienda y mejorar su casa.
texts.en:
Francisca is 53 years old. She went to school up to the second grade. She is married and her spouse works in construction. She has 4 children, but all of them are married. However, one of her daughters lives on the same land she does and her grandchildren are almost always in her house.  

Francisca has raised cattle for 20 years. She likes it a lot because she always has milk, cheese and curd. Everything she knows she learned from her parents, because they had cattle. In addition, she runs a small store, where she also earns income.

She needs the money fro the loan to buy a bull because she has cows and wants to increase her cattle herd. When she wants for one of her cows to get pregnant, she has to take it to her neighbor's bull and due to her age that is difficult for her. 

Her dream is to have more animals and be able to hire more people to care for her cattle. She also wants to stock her store and improve her home.

loans.use: to buy a bull.

loans.name: Juan De Jesus

texts.es:
Juan un humilde agricultor que cada mañana sale a trabajar en su campo, dedicado en pleno a su trabajo, este hombre solo piensa en progresar y entregar un buen producto pues sabe que muchas personas lo consumen y por ello cada gota de sudor que sale de su frente es el empeño que pone para que su productos salgan puros y de calidad, 

Como todo buen agricultor, quiere siempre implementar arreglos y mejoras para a sus cultivos pero sabe que estos arreglos o implementaciones son muy costosos por esta razón solicita un crédito para adecuar sus campos y comprtar insumos como fertilizantes, pesticidas, semillas de limon con el único propósito de mejorar su manera de cultivar, hacer más fácil su trabajo y darle al cliente final un producto de calidad.

todo esto para sacar adelante a sus hijos ( Ver Foto) y esposa.
texts.en:
Juan is a humble farmer who every morning goes to work in his field. Fully dedicated to his work, this man only thinks of progress and delivering a good product knowing that many people consume it. So every drop of sweat on his forehead is effort he puts forth so that products leave pure and of good quality.

Like all good farmers, he wants to implement adjustments and improvements for his crops, but knows that these are costly. Therefore, he is requesting a loan to adapt his farm and purchase supplies such as fertilizers, pesticides, and seeds with the sole purpose of improving the way they grow, making his work easier, and giving the end customers a product of quality.

All this he does to raise his children (see photo) and wife.

loans.use: adapt his fields and buy supplies like fertilizer, pesticides, and seeds.

loans.name: Erlinda

texts.en:
In the year 2013, Erlinda learned Paglaum MPC and the financial assistance it gives for desired business. As a farmer in Mahayag, she and her husband agreed to try their luck and borrowed a loan for rice production. After several months, she was able to return her borrowed capital. To this day, Erlinda feels she owes her good fortune to the Cooperative for having trusted her with the money she used for her farming business. 

Recently, she availed a loan to purchase farm inputs and fertilizer before planting season. Erlinda wishes to sustain her business and be able to manage a new income-related activities in the future.

loans.use: to purchase farm inputs and fertilizer

loans.name: Victoria

texts.en:
Victoria is 47 years old and married. She lives with her husband and three children in Mahayag, Zamboanga del Sur. For the past twenty years, Victoria and her husband had been farmers. She earns 15,000 PHP each cropping focusing on her rice farm. Victoria became an active member of PMPC in 2013. 

She is now requesting a 10,000 PHP loan to purchase fertilizer to have a heavier and higher crop yield on her rice farm. In the future, she hopes to expand her business to improve the general living conditions of her family.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer to have a heavier and higher crop yield on her rice farm

loans.name: Letecia

texts.en:
Letecia is 53 years old. She is married with five children and lives in Mahayag, Zamboanga del Sur. To earn a living, Letecia has managed her rice farm. She also engages in palay trading and a rice retailing business. She mastered doing these types of activities with her husband, to support their needs. She joined Paglaum Multi Purpose Cooperative in February of 2011. She is a hardworking mother who has strong determination to pursue her goals for the benefit of her family. 

Letecia requested a loan to purchase fertilizer to increase production on her rice farm, and pay for sacks of "palay" for rice retail. This will help increase her income and provide her children with a good and decent life. Someday, she hopes to buy a hauling truck for easy transport of her produce and variety rice.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer to increase production on her rice farm, and pay for sacks of "palay" for rice retail

loans.name: Nelvie

texts.en:
Nelvie lives in Mahayag, Zamboanga del Norte and she is married and was gifted with five children. Nelvie and her husband are both farmers. They raised their family doing this type of activity. This industrious member finds herself with her husband plowing the rice field, planting vegetables and other agricultural commodities to continue putting bread on their table. In need of additional working capital, Nelvie decided to join Paglaum Cooperative. 

She has received several loans already. Recently, she requested a 10,000 PHP loan to pay for labor cost, land preparation on her rice farm and fertilizers and herbicides to increase her crop yield. Being a MIGS (Member in Good Standing) of the Cooperative, she has been able to manage her income. She is able to provide for the daily needs of her family. Nelvie is very thankful because if it were not for PMPC, she might not have any savings at all nor be guided properly in her finances. She hopes to own a land tractor someday for fast and easy farm work.

loans.use: to pay for labor cost, land preparation on her rice farm, fertilizers and herbicides to increase her crop yield

loans.name: Conchita

texts.en: Conchita has always been enthusiastic of farming. She has cultivated their rice land in Mahayag, Zamboanga del Norte and has made good earnings doing this type of work. Recently, Conchita applied for a loan to pay for land and seedbed preparations for the next cropping season and for the purchase of higher yielding rice seeds and bags of fertilizer. This will ensure that the rice field is ready for planting. Conchita knows that she has to get things right to yield more income for this cropping season. In the future, Conchita hopes to own a rice thresher for additional profit.

loans.use: to pay for land and seedbed preparations for the next cropping season, and for the purchase of higher yielding rice seeds and bags of fertilizer

loans.name: Emetudio

texts.en: Emetudio is a Microfinance member of Pagluam Multi Purpose Cooperative. He has a piece of agricultural land in Mahayag and he grows rice as well. As a hardworking father of 3 he labors a lot to sufficiently provide the needs of his children. For this cropping season, he availed a loan to purchase fertilizers and chemicals for his farming activities. Emetudio wants to see all his children finish their studies.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers and chemicals for his farming activities, so that his children finish their studies

loans.name: Daylinda

texts.en: Daylinda is 62 years old, residing at Poblacion, Sindangan. Daylinda is married and she joined PMPC in order to access the programs and services. Recently, she has accessed another loan in the amount of PHP 14,900 for additional working capital for her existing business to buy a variety of commodities and food products that she sells in the local community.

loans.use: for additional working capital for her existing business. To buy a variety of commodities and food products that she sells

loans.name: Girlyn

texts.en: Girlyn is 37 years old, married, and has four children. The family lives in Sindangan. Girlyn operates a fishing business and owns fish cages. She earns a meager income each month doing this type of work, supporting the needs of her family especially her children's education. Girlyn requested a loan for 30,000 PHP, which she will use to repair and overhaul her fishing boat and maintain other fishing equipment to improve and expand her fishing business. In the future, she hopes to concrete her house.

loans.use: to repair and overhaul her fishing boat and maintain other fishing equipment to improve and expand her fishing business

loans.name: Ma. Lenie

texts.en:
Ma. Lenie is a housewife. She busies herself caring for her ornamental plants and earns a meager income from her hobby. 

Now, she plans to open a little store to earn additional income, to sufficiently provide for her family. 

She joined PMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve her living situation and develop her skill in business engagements. Ma. Lenie is requesting a loan of 14,000 PHP, which will be used to buy inventory such as canned goods, oil, sugar for her store.

loans.use: to buy inventory such as canned goods, oil, sugar for her store

loans.name: Remedios

texts.en:
Remedios is from Sindangan. She is 55 years old and a widow. Remedios owns and operates a retail store selling assorted goods in the local community. She has been engaged in her business for over six years and earns approximately 3,000 PHP a month. Remedios joined PMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve her living situation and her ability to engage in business activities. 

She has successfully repaid a previous loan from PMPC. Remedios is requesting a new loan of 5,000 PHP which will be used to purchase additional store inventory and to be used as working capital. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve the general living conditions of her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional store inventory and to be used as working capital

location.town: SINDANGAN-SIPAROK, JOSE DALMAN, ZAMBOANGA DEL NORT

loans.name: Conception

texts.en:
Thanks to you, dear lenders. Conception's previous loan of PhP 16,000 provided for additional stocks of fish in her business and increased her income. She wishes you more blessings and success in life.

She keeps on working hard and added new endeavor. She now makes "tinapa" and "embotido" and sells it in the market. Making “tinapa” or smoked fish is a process of preserving fish for later consumption. “Tinapa" is a delicious alternative to fresh fish or dried fish. “Embotido” making, on the other hand, is the processing of meat combined with hotdog, cheese, raisins, carrots, and other ingredients. Conception chose these two delicious food because these are in demand in their community. And she’s not mistaken. It is indeed a profitable enterprise.

The people in the community where Conception belongs are quite familiar with each other. When her neighbors ask for credit for her goods, she cannot refuse them. Sometimes it depletes her capital. She’s wishing that you could help again by lending additional capital of PhP 10,000. She will use this to buy more ingredients in processing smoked fish and “embotido”. 

Conception regularly meets with her co-fellowship* members to strengthen and inspire each other through the Word of God.

*All CCT community partners/clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and pay Micro Finance loans.

loans.use: to pay for additional stocks of fish needed in her smoked fish business.

loans.name: Agrifina

texts.en:
A $1500.00 is offered to Agrifina to improve her business.  She has a stall where many people come to buy every day. She will buy some additional supplies such as buckets, shelves, plates, spoons and bowls. She has been involving herself in business activities since 2010 and feels so comfortable to run her business because she can earn money every day.

Running a business has made Agrifina independent because she can be responsible for herself and also it is helping her family. She hopes to run a bigger business in the future.

loans.use: To buy buckets, shelves, plates, spoons and bowls

loans.name: Thelma

texts.en:
Thelma is 49 years old and has four children. Thelma is married and has two children who are currently in school.

Thelma is in the agricultural business, farming ornamental plants in the Philippines. Thelma requested a PHP 19000 loan through NWTF to buy fertilizers and other farm supplies.

Thelma has been farming ornamental plants for 8 years now, and has borrowed 8 times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, Thelma would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and other farm supplies

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy rice, vinegar, beans, mackerel, soft drink and beer to resell

loans.name: Catalina

texts.en:
Catalina is a married woman with four children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Catalina is 33 years old and has three children who are in school.

Catalina has a fishing business in the Philippines. She requested a 13,000 PHP loan amount through NWTF to buy fishing nets and other fishing supplies.

Catalina has been in this business for 10 years. In the future, she would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy fishing nets and other fishing supplies

loans.name: Luisa

texts.en:
Luisa is a single woman, 23 years old with two children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur.

Luisa has a fish vending business in the Philippines. She requested an 8,000 PHP loan amount through NWTF to purchase more fish to sell and other materials for her business.

Luisa has been in this business for 10 years. She would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more fish to sell and other materials for her business

loans.name: Carlos

texts.pt:
