O senhor Carlos tem 55 anos de idade, é casado, pai de 4 filhos, dos quais 02 frenquentando o ensino primário e  02 maiores de idade, vive com todos eles na sua casa própria.
Diz que com o valor do empréstimo  pretende comprar cerveja, refrigerantes, farinha, acucar, amendoim, leite, folha de cha, batata, pipoca.
Tem o sonho de adquirir uma viatura, para lhe ajudar no seu negocio.
Os maiores desafios sao doencas e  colocar a sua mercearia segura, gradeando porque sofre muitos roubos.
texts.en:
Carlos is 55 years old, married and the father of four children, two of whom go to primary school and two are adults. He lives with all of them in his own home.

Carlos says that with the money from this loan he hopes to buy beer, soft drink, flour, sugar, peanuts, milk, tea leaves, potatoes and popcorn. His dream is to acquire a vehicle to help him in his business. His biggest challenges are illness and keeping his merchandise safe by using a grill as he has been the victim of many robberies.

loans.use: to buy beer, soft drink, flour, sugar, peanuts, milk, tea leaves, potatoes and popcorn.

loans.name: Abbass

texts.en:
Abbass is a 24-year-old single man who works as an electrician, where he provides electricity maintenance services upon request, and works with some constructors on expanding and developing his working talents.

Abbass is well known in his region with his special talents and the customer services he provides. Thus, developing his business is his main aim, and a YOUTH loan acquired from Kiva's field partner Al Majmoua is his main support to register his car to use it freely in his business development since it saves him a lot of time and transportation expenses.

This is his first experience as an Al Majmoua borrower, and he is looking forward, with future plans that he would like to achieve through Al Majmoua loans in order to expand his working sector.

loans.use: to register his car to use it freely in his business development since it saves him a lot of time and transportation expenses

loans.name: Than

texts.en:
Than is aged 35 years old and is a mother of three children who are all in school.

Nowadays she grows rice on two hectares of farmland and has worked as a construction worker for six years, living in Kampong Cham province. She could earn about 68,500 KHR per day.

Than has been with VisionFund for one loan cycle already and completely paid back the loan. The previous loan helped her to have a better house to stay in.

Now she is applying for this new Kiva loan in order to buy seeds and fertilizer to support her farming. She hopes this loan will help her to earn more income and have the ability to expand her current business.

loans.use: to buy seeds and fertilizer to support her farming

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Cheung Prey district

loans.name: Ma.nanette

texts.en:
Maria Nanette is a married woman with seven children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Ma. Nanette is 49 years old and has two children still in school.

Ma. Nanette has a business buying and selling frozen food in the Philippines. She requested a 6,000 PHP loan amount through NWTF to purchase more frozen product to sell to her customers.

Ma. Nanette has been in this business for 3 years. She would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase more frozen product to sell to her customers

loans.name: Elizabeth

texts.en:
Elizabeth is a married woman with three children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Elizabeth is 35 years old and her three children are in school.

Elizabeth has a fish vending business in the Philippines. She requested a 20,000 PHP loan amount through NWTF to buy more fish to sell.

Elizabeth has been in this business for 4 years. In the future, she would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy more fish to sell

loans.name: Jocelyn

texts.en:
Jocelyn is aged 36, married to a carpenter and they're blessed with 1 child. 

She has owned and managed a food vending business in their village for almost three years and earns a net income of 3,000 PHP daily.

Due to lack of capital in her business, Jocelyn would like to avail herself of a loan amounting to 13,000 PHP to purchase snacks, ice cream, and ingredients to make juices to sell. She's hoping that her business will continue to improve and become more profitable.

loans.use: to purchase snacks, ice cream, and ingredients to make juices to sell

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a dairy cow so as to supply milk for more income gain

loans.name: Pinky

texts.en:
Pinky is a married woman with six children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Pinky is 42 years old and has five children who are currently in school.

Pinky has a general store business in the Philippines. She requested a 17,000 PHP loan amount through NWTF to purchase more stock to sell in her general store.

Pinky has been in this business for 3 years. In the future, she would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase more stock to sell in her general store

loans.name: Jacinta

texts.en:
As a married parent of two children, Jacinta works hard to support her family.

She has a business buying and selling rice in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from pig fattening. Jacinta is borrowing 30,000 PHP through NWTF to buy more sacks of rice to sell for her business buying and selling rice.

Jacinta has been sustaining her business activities through her past 12 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy more sacks of rice to sell

loans.name: Nancy

texts.en:
Nancy, 51, is a married woman with two children, one of whom is still in school. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. 

Nancy has a buy and sell frozen food business in the Philippines. She has been in this business for two years. 

Nancy requested a PHP 13,000 loan amount through NWTF to purchase more frozen food to sell like hot dogs, sausage etc. She would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more frozen food to sell like hot dogs, sausage etc.

loans.name: Roxan

texts.en:
Roxan, 39, is married with three adult children.

Her major source of income is buying and selling grocery items. She has been in this business for five years already. The business helped her meet her family's financial needs, especially the education of her children. She is still continuing the business because it provides good income due to her loyal customers. Someday, she will have a legacy to leave to her children. 

Her plan is to maintain her inventory so that her customers will be served well. She is still planning for a business expansion for the good of her children. She already availed loans previously to purchase additional stocks, and now she is re-applying for a loan for her store

loans.use: To purchase additional grocery items for her grocery store.

loans.name: Hea

texts.en:
Hea, 56, lives in a remote area of Siem Reap province, Cambodia. She is a mother of eight children. 

To make a living, she raises pigs for sale and earns, on average, USD 3.60 a day. 

She would like to improve her living standards by having clean energy for household use. Because of the lack of capital, she is asking for a loan to build a biogas digester under a project of NBP (National Biogas Program), partnering with HKL. 

After an initial investment in this system, she hopes that she won’t spend much money on fuel and there will be less smoke from wood or charcoal. She is very happy and thankful, because with this kind of loan product, HKL has offered a special interest rate better than its general loans. She awaits your kindness and relies on your generosity.

loans.use: to build a biogas digester.

loans.name: Ada

texts.en:
Ada, 44, is a married woman with two children who are both in school. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur.

Ada has a direct selling Splash products business in the Philippines. She has been in this business for two years. 

Ada requested a PHP 16,000 loan amount through NWTF to purchase more products from Splash to sell.
 
In the future, Ada would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase more products from Splash to sell.

loans.name: Marío Antonio

texts.es:
Mario, de 71 años de edad, está casado, tiene dos hijos los cuales trabajan y su pareja es comerciante y se dedica a criar cerdos tambien.

Mario, se dedica a hacer viajes en pick up, tiene 10 años de dedicarse a este negocio, también se dedica a criar ganado, su horario de trabajo es de 7:00 a.m. a 4:00 p.m. 

El crédito lo necesita para comprar ganado, con esto mejorara sus ingresos, ya que podrá criarlo y venderlo.

Sus sueños son, que su ganado se críe en buen estado, para que en un futuro pueda obtener buenos ingresos de la venta.
texts.en:
Mario, 71 years old, is married, has two children who work, and his wife is a businesswoman and works raising pigs as well.

Mario works making trips in a pick-up, he has 10 years of experience with this business. He also works raising cattle. His work schedule is 7:00 am to 4:00 pm.

He needs the loan to purchase cattle, with this he will increase his income, since he will be able to raise them and sell them. 

His dreams are that his cattle grow in good condition so that in the future he can get good income upon sale.

loans.use: to purchase cattle.

loans.name: Jose Edu

texts.es:
José, estudio hasta noveno grado, está casado y su pareja trabaja en los oficios domesticos y atiende su tienda, tiene dos hijos que viven con él pero solo uno estudia, el otro hijo aun no.

José, trabaja con ganado bovino de repasto, lo ha hecho por más de 6 años y lo aprendio de su padre, tambien tiene una tienda y trabaja en la agricultura; antes solo era empleado de seguridad. 

José, necesita el crédito para comprar ganado de repasto, con el préstamo mejorara mucho su hato y podrá mejorar sus ingresos.

Sus sueños son, trabajar duro y en cuanto a su familia, darles un mejor futuro, además desea ampliar más su tienda.
texts.en:
José went to school up to the ninth grade, is married, and his wife takes care of the domestic chores and tends their store. He has two children who live with him but only one goes to school, the other doesn't yet. 

José works with cattle, he has done so for more than 6 years, and learned it from his father. He also has a store and works in agriculture; before, he was only a security guard. 

José needs the loan to purchase cattle, with the loan he will improve his herd a lot and will be able to increase his income. 

His dreams are to work hard, and in regard to his family, give them a better future, in addition he wants to expand their store more.

loans.use: to purchase cattle.

loans.name: Jacinta

texts.en:
Jacinta is 59 years old and married. She has three children, one of  whom is in school.

Jacinta is in the agricultural business, raising pigs in the Philippines. She has been raising pigs for eight years now and has borrowed 12 times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

Jacinta requested a PHP 30,000 loan through NWTF to buy feeds and vitamins for her pigs and other supplies to raise livestock.

In the future, Jacinta would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy feeds and vitamins for her pigs and other supplies to raise livestock.

loans.name: Rosa

texts.en:
Rosa, 52  is a married woman with seven children, two of whom are still in school. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur.

Rosa has a buy and sell dried fish business in the Philippines. She has been in this business for five years. 

Rosa requested a PHP 6,000 loan amount through NWTF to purchase more boxes of dried fish other materials to sell for her business.

She would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase more boxes of dried fish and other materials to sell.

loans.name: Monika

texts.en:
Monika is aged 36, living with her three children in the area of Lahore, Pakistan. Her husband owns an artificial jewelry shop in the area of Lahore, Pakistan and lives near his shop, which is situated in the main market. It is challenging for him to sell his products because of competitors. This competition highly effects upon his daily sales. 

To grow his business, income and abstain from the competitors, he decided to offer some additional and stylish jewelry items. Monika's husband hopes that this strategy will work positively and the customers will be attracted towards his new products. Therefore, Monika requested a loan from Kiva’s field partner BRAC Pakistan, so that her husband would be able to buy some additional and stylish jewelry items. She says thanks to Kiva and to its field partner BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: to buy some additional and stylish jewelry items for her husband's artificial jewelry shop

loans.name: Monica Natalia

texts.es:
Monica, de 19 años, tiene muy claro que es lo que quiere para su vida y está decidida a culminar sus estudios para salir adelante y tener una buena vida.

Ella desea desempeñarse como vendedora de mercancía variada tales como accesorios para el hogar.

Esta actividad desea iniciarla con el afán de buscar los recursos necesarios para su sostenimiento y para sus estudios, además de poder contribuir con los gastos en su hogar.
Es una mujer emprendedora y muy disciplinada.

Ella solicita un crédito para comprar un amplio surtido de accesorios de limpieza para el hogar y cacharrería, de este modo aprovechar la oportunidad que le presenta la Corporación Interactuar de ser independiente.

Tiene la esperanza de poder progresar como empresaria y tener unos ingresos más estables y agradece a todas las personas que puedan contribuir con su sueño.
texts.en:
Monica, 19 years old, is very clear on what she wants for her life and is determined to finish her schooling to get ahead and have a good life.

She wants to work selling a variety of goods such as household products. 

She wants to begin this work with the desire to seek the necessary resources to support herself and for her education, in addition to being able to contribute to the household expenses.

She is an enterprising and very disciplined woman. 

She asks for a loan to purchase a wide assortment of household cleaning supplies and small miscellaneous items, and in this way take advantage of the opportunity that Corporación Interactuar offers her to be independent.

She has the hope of being able to progress as a businesswoman and have some more stable income and is grateful to all the people who can contribute to her dream.

loans.use: to purchase a wide assortment of household cleaning products and small miscellaneous items.

loans.name: Marisela

texts.es:
Marisela una mujer de 36 años de edad que se encuentra muy motivada y emocionada ante la oportunidad que se le presenta en la vida y es que gracias a la Corporación Interactuar puede solicitar un préstamo para iniciar su propio negocio de preparación de comidas, un sueño que le ha sido errado pues al ser su primera experiencia crediticia no le desembolsaban el préstamo. 

Con el crédito solicitado comprara surtido de ingredientes para la preparación de alimentos variados. 

Este crédito será de suma importancia para Marisela pues representa el principio de una vida como independiente y una oportunidad de progresar como empresaria.
texts.en:
Marisela, a 36-year-old woman, is very motivated and excited by the opportunity that presents itself in her life, and it is thanks to Corporación Interactuar that she can ask for a loan to begin her own business of food production, a dream that has been missed because with her first experience with a loan, they didn't pay out her loan. 

With the requested loan, she will purchase an assortment of ingredients to prepare a variety of dishes.

This loan will be very important for Marisela because it represents the beginning of an independent life and an opportunity to progress as a businesswoman.

loans.use: to purchase an assortment of ingredients to prepare various dishes.

loans.name: Kikay Group

texts.en:
Susan is the featured borrower of Kikay group. She got together with the other group members to acquire a loan from Kiva's field partner Al Majmoua. They have been best friends since they arrived in Lebanon to work as housekeepers, leaving their families back home in their Philippine hometown. 

Susan is a 43-year-old widowed mother of three children, for whom she works hard as a housekeeper to provide them with the best living and education since her husband passed away, leaving her alone responsible for their living.

Susan has a limited monthly income. For this reason, the Al Majmoua loan will help her a lot in paying for her children's increasing school tuition fees. This will make her dream of supporting her children's education possible.

She is the lady at the left side of the picture. As for the other group members, Maria Amy is the lady at the center with pink blouse, while Carmelita is the lady at the right with green blouse.

loans.use: To pay for her children's increasing school tuition fees, making possible her dream to support their schooling.

loans.name: Marietha

texts.en:
Marietha, who in her mid 20s is single with one child who is still small. She has been running a salon business for three years now. She works from 7am to 630pm daily and is able to make a good monthly profit.

This will be Marietha's 4th loan from Tujijenge Tanzania. She used the previous loans to increase her salon products and has paid back all of her loan successfully. She used the profit to take care of her kid, make her loan repayments and covered household expenses. She will use this loan to buy up to date salon products and meet her customers' requests. She dreams of owning a clothing shop.

Marietha will make sure she pays back her loan according to the schedule.

loans.use: to buy up to date salon products and meet her customers' requests.

loans.name: Mary Jane

texts.en:
Mary Jane works hard to support five children. She is married and raises livestock in the Philippines.

Mary Jane requested a PHP 6,350 loan through NWTF to invest in a solar lamp.

She is getting the solar lamp because she wants to provide her children with bright light when they study at night.

Mary Jane is aware that by using the solar lamp, she is not only saving money, she is also helping the environment and reducing health and hazard risks to her family.

loans.use: to buy a solar lamp.

loans.name: Ma. Fe

texts.en:
Ma. Fe is a married woman with four children. Ma. Fe is 42 years old and all four of her children are in school. She is a very hard working entrepreneur.

Ma. Fe has a buy-and-sell fruit business in the Philippines. She has been in this business for 20 years. Ma. Fe requested a PHP 10,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy more fruit to sell on her fruit stall.

In the future, Ma. Fe would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy more fruit to sell on her fruit stall.

loans.name: Jose Elmer

texts.es:
Elmer, de 22 años de edad, está soltero y estudio hasta tercer grado, vive con su mamá y sus dos hermanos. 

Elmer, es agricultor y se dedica a la siembra de hortalizas como pipianes, chiles y rabanos desde hace 2 años; anteriormente solo cultivaba maiz, pero decidio innovar su produccion, ya que considera que es más rentable sembrar hortalizas.

El credito que está solicitando es para comprar los insumos necesarios para el cultivo como: abono, pesticidas y herbicidas, ya que tiene limitados sus recursos economicos y considera que con el crédito solventara su necesidad. 

Elmer, sueña con seguir cultivando cada vez más, para mejorar su produccion y sus ganancias.
texts.en:
Elmer, 22, is single and studied up to the third grade. He lives with his mother and two siblings.

Elmer has been working in agriculture for two years, growing vegetables such as squash, chili and radish. He used to grow corn only, but he decided to innovate, since he thinks that it is more profitable to grow these kinds of vegetables.

He is requesting a loan to buy the supplies he needs for his plantations, such as fertilizers, pesticides and herbicides. He lacks financing and believes that this loan will solve that problem.

Elmer dreams of expanding his plantations more and more in order to improve his production and profits.

loans.use: to buy supplies for his plantations, such as fertilizer, pesticides and herbicides.

loans.name: Myriam De Jesus

texts.es:
Con la ilusión de salir adelante y superarse, Myriam desea tener un negocio de transporte de personas en el municipio de Turbo.

Esta idea surge a partir de la motivación que le dio su hijo mayor que la impulsa para montar este negocio y así generar los ingresos necesarios para el sostenimiento de su hogar. 

Aunque ella siempre ha querido ser independiente, nunca había tenido el valor de arriesgarse a iniciar con un negocio; pero ahora se siente con la fuerza y capacidad para hacerlo.

Ella solicita un préstamo para comprar dos motocicletas.
Con estos elementos podrá iniciar con este proyecto y podrá cumplir así su sueño de ser independiente.

Con el apoyo a este crédito estarás impulsando las ideas emprendedoras de una madre colombiana!
texts.en:
With the idea of getting ahead and improving herself, Myriam wants to have a business transporting people in the municipality of Turbo.

This idea came about from the motivation that her oldest son gave her, which pushed her to undertake this business, and in this way generate the necessary income to support her household.

Although she has always wanted to be independent, she has never had the courage to take the risk and open a business. But, now she feels she has the strength and ability to do it.

She asks for a loan to purchase two motorcycles.

With these, she will be able to begin with this project and will be able to achieve her dream of being independent in this way. 

With the support of this loan, you will be boosting the entrepreneurial ideas of a Colombian mother!

loans.use: to purchase two motorcycles to begin her transportation business.

loans.name: Edwin Miguel

texts.es:
Edwin, de 24 años de edad, es una persona trabajadora y muy dedicada a lo que hace, estudio una carrera técnica en la universidad, actualmente está acompañado y solo tiene un hijo, pero junto a ellos viven sus tres hijastras, que van a la escuela y su pareja se dedica a atender su tienda y a elaborar productos comestibles como pan y pupusas.

Edwin, necesita el crédito para comprar 2 terneras, para trabajar y generar un ingreso extra, ya que también presta sus servicios en el transporte de pasajeros. 

Su principal sueño, es encontrar un trabajo donde pueda demostrar su aprendizaje y devengar un sueldo para el sustento de su familia, así como también desea darle lo necesario a su familia y que su negocio de ganado aumente parcialmente.
texts.en:
Edwin is 24 years old. He is a very hard working person and he is devoted to what he does. He pursued technical studies at the university. He has a partner and only one child, but his three stepchildren live with them too. They are in school, and his partner looks after her store and makes edibles like bread and pupusas.

Edwin needs the loan to buy two calves, to work and earn some extra income, since he also offers his services transporting passengers.

His main dream is to find work that shows what he has learned and that will provide a salary to support his family. He also wants to give his family what they need, and hopes that his livestock business will grow.

loans.use: to buy two calves.

loans.name: Malai

texts.en:
Malai is from Phnomsrok, a village in the northwest of Cambodia. She is 35 years old and lives in a wooden house with her parents as she is not married.  Her family owns two hectares of rice fields and two cows. 

In 2012 she was trained by Soieries du Mékong, a social enterprise that fights against rural exodus and for empowerment of women by training them and offering them sustainable work in the village. Malai makes scarves that are sold in Cambodia and Europe. She uses her weaving income to pay for her own expenses and to help her mother buy the fertilizer and diesel for the fields and the food for the cows. 

Thanks to the loan, she will buy the silk and pay for the dyeing and preparation of the loom. Please support her so she can keep making beautiful traditional hand-woven scarves!

loans.use: To buy silk and pay fees related to loom preparation.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase certified fertilizers and seeds for her farming

loans.name: Preab

texts.en:
Preab, 37, lives in a remote area of Siem Reap province, Cambodia. She is a mother of two children. To make a living, she raises pigs for sale and earns, on average, an earning of USD 10.00 a day. She would like to improve her living standard by having clean energy for household use. 

Because of the lack of capital, she is asking for a loan to build a biogas digester, under the project of NBP (National Biogas Program) in partnering with HKL. After an initial investment in this system, she hopes that she won’t spend much money on fuel and lessen smoke from wood or charcoal. She is very happy and thankful, because with this kind of loan product, HKL has offered a special interest rate than its general loans. She awaits your kindness and relies on your generosity.

loans.use: to build a biogas digester

loans.name: Dullisarrk

texts.en:
Dullisarrk, 29 years old, lives in Kampong Speu province, Cambodia. He is a single man. At the present time, he is a university student.

This semester, he is lacking money to pay for his school fees. Therefore, he is applying for a loan from Kiva to pay for his university fees. With the support from this loan, he hopes that it can push him to get a higher education which will allow him to seek a better career in the future.

He is thankful for the loan granted through HKL with a much lower interest rate than other general loan products.

loans.use: to pay for his university fees

loans.name: Gerson Jonatan

texts.es:
Gerson, de 31 años de edad, es una persona muy trabajadora, que a pesar de las distintas dificultades de la vida, ha podido salir adelante, actualmente está acompañado y vive con su esposa y sus 3 hijos, de los cuales 2 van a la escuela y el otro esta pequeño. 

Gerson, trabaja en estructuras metálicas, donde elabora puertas, techos y otros productos, mientras que su esposa es ama de casa, por lo que sus ingresos son el único sustento para su familia, también realiza trabajos agrícolas.

Gerson, necesita el crédito para lograr terminar de construir el techo de su casa, porque se quedó a mitad del proyecto por no tener los recursos necesarios. 

Sus sueños son, lograr tener una familia y tener una casa segura para que su familia este segura, además desea que sus hijos estudien y se preparen académicamente.
texts.en:
Gerson is 31 years old and a very hard-working person who, in spite of his various difficulties in life, has been able to get ahead. He is currently accompanied and lives with his wife and their three children. Two of their kids go to school and the other is still too young.

Gerson works with metallic structures, making doors, roofs and other products. Meanwhile his wife is a stay-at-home mother and this is the reason his income is the only one the family has. He also works with agricultural jobs. 

Gerson needs the credit in order to finish construction on the roof of his home because he was left halfway done due to insufficient funds. 

His dreams are to be able to have a family and have a secure home for his family to be secure within, he also wants his children to study and prepare themselves academically.

loans.use: be able to finish construction on the roof of his home.

loans.name: Merlyn

texts.en:
Merlyn is 46 years old, married and has five children to provide for. With the help of her husband, she is engaged in vegetable gardening in order to earn a living. She plants vegetables and sells them to the market. She aims for a better living for her family, especially her children.

She took a loan to buy fertilizer for her vegetable plants to result in good quality vegetables. She hopes to have an abundant harvest so that she can have increased sales and earn more income.

Merlyn plan for the future is to save money from her business.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer for her vegetable plants.

loans.name: Samphors

texts.en:
Samphors is from Phnom Srok, a village in the North-West of Cambodia. She is 37-years-old. She lives in a wooden traditional khmer house with her parents. Her family owns 5 hectares of rice fields and 5 cows. In 2013 she was trained by Soieries du Mékong, a social enterprise which fights against rural exodus and for empowerment of women by training them and offering them sustainable work in the village. 

Samphors makes scarves which are sold in Cambodia and Europe. She uses her weaving income to pay for her family expenses and to buy fertilizer for the fields.  Thanks to the loan, she will buy the silk and pay for the dyeing and preparation of the loom. Please support her so she can keep making beautiful traditional hand woven scarves!

loans.use: To buy silk and pay for loom preparation related fees

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy mobile accessories for her husband's mobile phone shop.

loans.name: Rin

texts.en:
Rin is a 58-year-old man from a remote area of Kampong Speu Province. He is a father of three children. He is a water seller and earns, on average, an earning of USD 10.00 per day. So far, he has been in this type of business for twenty-one years. He would like to improve his living standard by having clean energy for household use. 

Because of the lack of capital, he is asking for a loan to build a biogas digester, under the project of NBP (National Biogas Program) in partnering with HKL. After an initial investment in this system, he hopes that he won’t spend much money on fuel and lessen smoke from wood or charcoal. He is very happy and thankful, because with this kind of loan product, HKL has offered a special interest rate than its general loans. He awaits your kindness and relies on your generosity.

loans.use: to build a biogas digester

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase farm inputs such as fertilizers and maize seeds for planting

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to lease more land to expand her farming activity

loans.name: Evangeline

texts.en:
Evangeline works hard to support eight children. She is married and has a business raising livestock in the Philippines.

Evangeline requested a PHP 6,350 loan through NWTF to buy a solar lamp. She is getting the solar lamp because she wants to provide her children with bright light when they study at night.

Evangeline is aware that by using the solar lamp, she is not only saving money, she is also helping the environment and reducing health and hazard risks to her family.

loans.use: to buy a solar lamp.

loans.name: Elizabeth

texts.en:
Elizabeth is 40 years old and married with eight children.

She earns a living by raising livestock in the Philippines. Elizabeth is borrowing PHP 15,000 through NWTF to buy feeds and other supplies to raise her livestock.

Elizabeth has been raising livestock for three years and also earns additional income from food vending.

She is working tirelessly towards the attainment of her dream: to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy feeds and other supplies to raise her livestock

loans.name: Kanikei

texts.ru: Каникей, 61 год, вдова, мать 7 детей. У нее среднее образование, сейчас на пенсии. Каникей трудолюбива, ответственна и целеустремленна. Каникей в качестве дополнительного дохода для своей семьи, с 1993 года занимается животноводством. Благодаря упорному труду, в хозяйстве имеется 4 коровы, лошадь. Предпринимательская деятельность приносит Каникей ежемесячную прибыль в размере около 17,000 сом (KGS). Дети помогают материально, высылая средства. Но Каникей хочется быть независимой, поэтому она решила инвестировать в свой бизнес и обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 30,000 сом (KGS) на покупку 18 овец, это позволит улучшить доходы Каникей. В дальнейшем она планирует вложить в дальнейшее увеличение своего хозяйства.
texts.en:
Kanikei is 61 and widowed with seven children. She has a high school education and is now retired. She is a hardworking, responsible and purposeful person who has been working in animal husbandry since 1993 as an additional source of income. Thanks to her hard work, she currently has four cows and a horse on her farm. Her business brings in a monthly income of about 17,000 KGS. 

Her children help out by sending money, but Kanikei wants to be independent. Therefore she has decided to invest in her business and has approached Bai Tushum Bank for a loan of 30,000 KGS to purchase 18 sheep, which will allow her to improve her income. In the future she plans to invest further into improving her farm.

loans.use: to purchase 18 sheep for fattening and resale in order to invest in her business and increase her income

loans.name: Maria Agustina

texts.es:
María, de 22 años de edad, es una señorita muy trabajadora, está soltera, no tiene ningún hijo y actualmente vive con sus padres y 4 hermanos menores que ella y que asisten a la escuela.- Por motivos de distancia, tiempo y falta de recursos económicos, no pudo seguir estudiando y únicamente pudo estudiar noveno grado. 

María, después de dejar de estudiar se dedicó a la elaboración de petates, para generar ingresos y cubrir los gastos de su casa. 

María, necesita el crédito para comprar materia prima para la elaboración de petates y para comprar fertilizantes para cultivar granos básicos y de esa manera ayudarle a su papá para que siembre.

Su principal sueño, es generar los ingresos suficientes para cubrir con los gastos de su familia.
texts.en:
María is 22 years old and a very hard working young lady. She is single, does not have kids and currently lives with her parents and four younger brothers who are in school. Due to reasons of distance, time and insufficient economic resources she was not able to continue studying and was only able to study up to ninth grade.

María, after leaving her studies, dedicated herself to the production of woven mats to produce income and cover her household's expenses.

María needs the loan to purchase raw materials for the production of woven mats and to purchase fertilizers for the cultivation of basic grains in order to be able to help her father plant his crops.

Her biggest dream is to generate sufficient income to cover her family's expenses.

loans.use: purchase raw materials for the production of woven mats and to purchase fertilizers for the cultivation of basic grains.

loans.name: Hanaa

texts.en:
Hanaa is an 18-year-old divorced mother of one child. She got married at an early age and started to work at the age of 16 to improve her living. She is working hard to make sure that when she gets her son back to live with her, she can provide him with best standards of living.

Hanaa is well known in her region; she has been working as a hairdresser since September 2014. She runs her business from her house and is very anxious that one day, when she improves her financial situation, she can open her own beauty salon and introduce her talents to more customers.

Today, Hanaa is acquiring a youth loan from Kiva's field partner Al Majmoua to increase the services she provides to her customers, which will automatically increase her income. Through this youth loan, she will buy a specialized tattoo machine that will develop her business and attract more customers.

loans.use: to buy a specialized tattoo machine that will develop her business and attract more customers

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to equip his business with shaving machines to serve more customers.

loans.name: Inas

texts.en:
Inas is a 37-year-old married mother of four children who has been running her own bakery for two and a half years to support her husband, who works as a school bus driver, in covering their family's increasing needs.

Inas is a hard worker who puts so much effort into developing her business. But, since her income is barely enough to cover her family's increasing living needs, Inas is acquiring a loan from Kiva's field partner Al Majmoua in order to perform necessary maintenance to her bakery to keep it a healthy workplace and attract more customers. She will make better decoration and will improve her production. 

Inas will also work hard on providing her children with the best education to make sure that they can benefit from a better future. 

Inas is very optimistic about this loan and will work hard on developing her career more in the future.

loans.use: to perform necessary maintenance to her bakery to keep it a healthy workplace and attract more customers

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to improve her farming through setting up a shed for her livestock and seeking veterinary services.

loans.name: Wendy Gloribel

texts.es:
Wendy, de 27 años de edad, estudio hasta bachillerato, está acompañada, tiene un hijo de 7 años de edad que asiste a la escuela.

Wendy, se dedica a los oficios domesticos del hogar y al cuido de su niño.

El crédito sera utilizado para comprar insumos agricolas como abono, pesticidas y herbicidas, ya que su compañero de vida es agricultor y ella lo apoya con capital de trabajo. 

Ella, planea obtener un nuevo crédito, para realizarle mejoras a su vivienda.
texts.en:
Wendy is 27 years old, she studied until high school, she is accompanied and has a 7 year old son who is in school.

Wendy dedicates herself to the household chores and the care of the child.

The loan will be used to purchase agricultural materials such as fertilizer, pesticides and herbicides as her life partner is a farmer and she supports him with working capital.

She plans to obtain a new loan to make some improvements to their home.

loans.use: purchase agricultural materials such as fertilizer, pesticides and herbicides.

loans.name: Tessie

texts.en:
Tessie is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a bakery business in the Philippines. 

She is borrowing PHP 10,000 through NWTF to purchase ingredients like flour, margarine, butter, sugar, etc., for her bread production business.

Tessie has been in this business for 10 years. Tessie earns additional income from a general store.

Tessie has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase ingredients like flour, margarine, butter, sugar, etc., for her bread production business

loans.name: Champei

texts.en:
Champei is from Phnom Srok, a village in the North-West of Cambodia. She is 31-years-old and lives with her parents. Her family owns 5 hectares of rice fields. In 2012 she was trained by Soieries du Mékong, a social enterprise which fights against rural exodus and for empowerment of women by training them and offering them sustainable work in the village. Champei makes scarves which are sold in Cambodia and Europe. 

She uses her weaving income to pay for her family expenses and to buy fertilizer for the fields. Thanks to the loan, she will buy the silk and pay for the dyeing and preparation of the loom. Please support her so she can keep making beautiful traditional hand woven scarves!

loans.use: To buy silk and pay for loom preparation related fees

loans.name: Procerpina

texts.en:
Procerpina is 58 years old and widowed with four children.  

Procerpina is in the agricultural business of raising livestock in the Philippines. Procerpina requested a PHP 20,000 loan through NWTF to buy feeds and other supplies to raise her livestock.

Procerpina has been raising livestock for two years now, and has borrowed three times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

Procerpina would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy feeds and other supplies to raise her livestock

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to restock the out-of-stock items in her food store.

loans.name: Juliah

texts.en:
Juliah is 40 years old, married and supports four children. 

She is a small-scale farmer. She has applied for her first loan of KES 25,000 from VisionFund Kenya to purchase farm inputs to improve her production. 

She plans to use the anticipated profits to repay the loan and educate her children. 

Her hope is to lead a better life.

loans.use: to purchase farm inputs to improve her production.

loans.name: Sandra

texts.en:
Sandra is a married woman with three children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. Sandra is 35 years old and has three children who are in school.

Sandra has a general store business in the Philippines. Sandra requested a PHP 10,000 loan amount through NWTF to purchase more groceries to sell in her general store.

Sandra has been in this business for three years. In the future, Sandra would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries to sell in her general store

loans.name: Elisa

texts.en:
Great day, dear lenders! 

Thank you for your wonderful generosity to Elisa. Recently, she was given a loan worth PHP 10,000 that she utilized in developing her buy-and-sell business. With that, she was able to buy supplies of bedsheets, women's clothes, pants and other items to sell. As a result, she was able to gain a higher income at hand. What a great joy it brings to her and to her family! 

Note that besides her buy-and-sell business, she is also handling a small sari-sari (variety) store. She hopes to expand this, too. Thus, she is asking if she could take out a loan amounting to PHP 15,000 that she would use in purchasing additional supplies of merchandise products such as grocery items, toiletries, beverages and other similar products. The hope is that you'll consider this because this is a lot more now to her. It would be a great remedy for her family's daily living expenses. 

Someday, she dreams of nothing more than to just be successful in life. She meets up with her co-fellowship* members to share stories of her work every week, and there, she can also draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God that she studies.

* All CCT community partners/clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and repay microfinance loans.

loans.use: to purchase additional grocery items, toiletries, beverages and other similar products.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase farm inputs such as fertilizers and maize seeds for improved farming activity so as to meet client and family needs.

loans.name: Stellah

texts.en:
Stellah is 31 years old, married to James and supports three children. She has been practicing farming for the last seven years, earning KES 10,000 per month. 

Stellah has applied for her first loan of KES 25,000 from VisionFund Kenya to buy farm inputs for use in the farm for higher production to supply more income gain. 

She plans to use the anticipated profits to educate her children and to start poultry farming in the area. Her future hopes and dreams are to be financially stable.

loans.use: to buy farm inputs for use in the farm.

loans.name: Wenilyn

texts.en:
Wenilyn is a married woman with three children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. Wenilyn is 36 years old, and two of her children are currently in school.

Wenilyn has a motorcycle transport business in the Philippines. Wenilyn requested a PHP 12,000 loan amount through NWTF to purchase spare parts, gasoline, etc., for her business.

Wenilyn has been in this business for six years. In the future, Wenilyn would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase spare parts, gasoline, etc., for her business

loans.name: Hay

texts.en: HAY, 58, lives in a small community of Kampong Cham Province, Cambodia. He is a father of seven children. To make a living and support his family, he works as a security guard and earns, on average, an income of USD 5.50 a day. He wants to improve the general living conditions of the entire family by having a latrine to use, because there is no latrine in his house now. Therefore, he is borrowing a loan from KIVA to build a latrine. By doing this, he can help his family members gain access to sanitation, promote their health, and help to lessen environmental deterioration. He is thankful for the loan granted through HKL with a much lower interest rate than other general loan products.

loans.use: to build a latrine

loans.name: Dalila

texts.en:
Dalila is 49 years old and has a live-in partner with five children.

Dalila works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more items like noodles, coffee, canned goods, eggs, seasonings, etc. to sell.

Dalila has borrowed and paid 3 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for 2 years and also earns an income from raising pigs.

Dalila aspires to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more items like noodles, coffee, canned goods, eggs, and seasonings to sell.

loans.name: Samandar

texts.en: Samandar was born in the southern part of Tajikistan in 1992. He is single and lives with his family. Samandar is a student at the university where he is well known among friends and course mates. He is active in classes and wants to excel in his studies. His major is finance and credit. He has big future plans after his graduation. He appealed to Kiva's partner, IMON International, for a loan to pay his tuition fee at the university. He hopes to be supported by KIVA lenders.

loans.use: to pay his university tuition fee

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase farm inputs like fertilizer and maize seedlings for planting

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more stocks of farm supplies to sell for more income gain.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to construct a stable stall and to increase her stock of produce.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase farm inputs like fertilizer, pesticide and herbicides

loans.name: Carlos Augusto

texts.es:
El señor Carlos tiene gran experiencia en el área de restaurante, hace algún tiempo inicio con su propia Salsamentaria que hasta ahora le ha generado muy buenos resultados.

Siempre ha preferido trabajar independiente, trabaja todos los días desde las 8:00 Am hasta las 9:00 Pm

Actualmente necesita un auxilio para realizar la compra de insumos para realizar sus preparaciones.

El préstamo le permitirá trabajar en unas mejores condiciones y podrá garantizar la calidad de sus preparaciones.

Su mayor sueño es poder tener una gran salsamentaría donde pueda atender muchos clientes.

Con esta ayuda podrá trabajar de una manera más organizada.

Con tu ayuda Carlos Podrá pagar la educación de sus hijos que es uno de sus más grandes sueños, aporta hoy!
texts.en: Carlos has vast experience in the restaurant field. Some time ago he started his own deli and now he is seeing good results. He has always preferred to work independently, he works every day from 8 am until 9 pm. Now he needs some help with buying supplies to make his food. The loan will  allow him to work in the best conditions and he can guarantee the quality of his food. His greatest dream is to have a big deli where he can serve a lot more customers. With this support he can work in a more organized manner. With your help Carlos can pay for his children's education which is one of his greatest dreams.

loans.use: to buy supplies to make his foods like meat, vegetables and rice amongst others.

loans.name: Jane

texts.en: Jane is 47 years old, married to David, and supports a family five children. She has been practicing dairy farming for the last 18 years earning 12,000 KES per month. Jane has applied for her first loan of 25,000 KESfrom Kiva's partner, Vision Fund Kenya, to buy animal feed and supplies for higher milk production. She plans to use the anticipated profits to educate her children and to start a retail shop. Her future hopes and dreams are to be financially stable.

loans.use: to buy animal feed and supplies for higher milk production.

loans.name: Maria De Lurdes

texts.pt:
O senhora Maria De Lurdes é comerciante tem 35 anos de idade é casada, mãe de 05 filhos dos quais ainda 01 menor de idade, os restantes 04 estudam no ensino secundário, não sustenta mais ninguém e vive na casa própria .
Com o valor do crédito pretende comprar feijão, amendoim, açúcar, peixe, pedaços de frangos,omo para revender na sua banca.
Tem projectos de  comprar uma viatura para fazer transporte semi-colectivo de passageiros, fazer murro de vedação na sua casa e uma loja.
O seu maior desafio e a insuficiência de fundos e para ultrapassá los conta com ajuda de seu esposo e que com o empréstimo passado legalizou um espaço e actualmente esta a fazer blocos mas diz que irá solicitar mais empréstimos para tal vai pagar pontualmente .
texts.en:
Maria de Lurdes is a businesswoman. She is 35 years old, married, and the mother of five children. One of them is underage and the remaining four go to secondary school. She does not maintain anyone else and lives in a house that she owns.

With the requested amount she plans to buy beans, peanuts, sugar, fish, and chicken parts to resell at her stall.

She plans to buy a vehicle to offer passenger transport services, build a division wall at home and a store.

Her biggest obstacle is the lack of funding, although her husband helps her to overcome it. With the previous loan she rented a place to make bricks. She says she will request more loans and will pay them according to plan.

loans.use: to buy beans, peanuts, sugar, fish, chicken parts and detergent to sell.

loans.name: Huber Antonio

texts.es:
Huber, con 44 años de edad, es un hombre casado y con un hijo. 
Nació y se crió en el campo, donde aprendió las labores agrícolas al lado de su padre; gracias a ello, hoy en día tiene cultivos de café, cuya cosecha es vendida y de esta manera obtiene los recursos para llevar el alimento a su hogar. 

El prestatario es un hombre pujante, luchador, dedicado a su familia y a su trabajo, eso lo motiva para trabajar largas jornadas y tratar de salir adelante; día a día lucha para sobrepasar los obstáculos que se le presentan, ha pasado por situaciones económicas difíciles debido al bajo precio del café en el mercado, lo que afecta el precio de su producto. 

Huber solicita su crédito en la Corporación Interactuar para invertirlo en la compra de insumos agrícolas (abono, fertilizantes, pesticidas), con el fin de darle continuidad a su negocio y preparar sus cultivos para cosechar un producto de muy buena calidad.

Huber sueña con mejorar sus cultivos, ampliarlos para obtener de estos una buena renta mensual.
texts.en:
Huber at 44 years old is a married man with one child. He was born in the countryside where he learned agricultural work from his father.

Thanks to this today he has coffee crops. He sells the harvests and in this way he obtains the resources to provide food for his household. The borrower is a vigorous man, a fighter, dedicated to his family and work. This is his motivation to work long days and try to get ahead. Day by day he strives to overcome the obstacles that occur. He has been through some difficult economic situations due to the lowering in the price of coffee on the market which affects the price of his product.

Huber is requesting a loan from the Interactuar Corporation to invest in buying agricultural inputs (manure, fertilizer and pesticides) with the aim of continuity to his business and prepare his crops to harvest a good quality product. Huber dreams of improving his crops, expanding them to obtain a good monthly income from them.

loans.use: to buy agricultural inputs (manure, fertilizer and pesticides).

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase a dairy cow

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy natural medicine in order to improve his quality of life and that of his parents.

loans.name: Rosiris Del Carmen

texts.es:
La señora Rosiris es una veterana de mil batallas vividas a lo largo de su vida, vive en el municipio de Puerto Boyacá con su esposo y sus dos hijos que tiene en la universidad.

Ella es una mujer muy trabajadora y desde hace algún tiempo viene trabajando en el negocio de la venta de jugos de fruta. 

Trabaja todos los días durante 8 horas.
Su negocio consiste en la preparación y venta de estas bebidas. El ofrece sus productos de manera ambulante y cuando un cliente le hace un pedido, intenta satisfacer su necesidad a toda cabalidad. 

Manifiesta que es un negocio sencillo de realizar para su edad.

Ella solicita un préstamo para compra de surtido de frutas o otros insumos.

El préstamo le dará la oportunidad de capitalizar su negocio y de darle un impulso considerable a su actividad, permitiéndole obtener recursos para la universidad de sus hijos.
texts.en:
Rosiris is a veteran of a thousand battles lived during her lifetime.  She lives in the Puerto Boyacá municipality with her husband and her two children, who attend the university.

She is a very hard-working woman, and she has been working in her business of selling fruit juices for some time.  She works every day for eight hours.

Her business consists of preparing and selling these drinks.  She sells her products in an itinerant manner.  When a customer makes a request, she tries to completely meet their need.  She says that it is an easy business to conduct for her age.


She is requesting a loan to buy a stock of fruit or other supplies.  The loan will give her the chance to capitalize her business and to energize it considerably.  This will allow her to get resources for her children’s university.

loans.use: to buy a stock of fruit or other supplies.

loans.name: Ubaldo Enrique

texts.es:
Ubaldo es un campesino de 55 años de edad, se dedica a las actividades agrícolas de cultivo y a la cría  de aves, vive humilde pero felizmente en su hogar, produce su alimento e igualmente vende en la plaza de mercado para generar los ingresos con los que paga, los servicios públicos, el complemento de sus alimentos y genera el sustento para los demás gastos de su familia conformada por sus dos hijos y pareja.

Ubaldo trabaja por mejorar las condiciones de su vivienda, por ampliar sus terrenos, por tener mayor número de animales, se ve en un futuro con una granja con cerdos, vas, terneros, toros etc.

Solicita un préstamo para la compra de insumos de mantenimiento de su cultivos como abonos, riegos y pesticidas, igualmente necesita comprar alimento para sus pollos, cuido y maíz, su préstamo será muy significativo ya que le ayudara a un orgullo a agricultor a tener los insumos necesarios para seguir realizando su noble profesión.
texts.en:
Ubaldo is a 55-year-old farmer. He dedicates himself to agricultural work farming and raising chickens. He lives humbly, but happily, at home. He produces food for home consumption and also sells in the marketplace to generate income to pay for utilities, to supplement their food and support their livelihoods, and to pay for other expenses for his family, which consists of his two children and his partner. 

Ubaldo works to improve his housing conditions, expand his lands, have more animals in the future. He envisions a farm with pigs, cows, calves, bulls, and more. He is applying for a loan for the purchase of agricultural inputs such as fertilizers, irrigation, and pesticides. He also needs to buy food for his chicks (feed and corn). His loan will be very significant because it will help a proud farmer have the inputs necessary to continue performing his noble profession.

loans.use: to purchase agricultural inputs and chicken feed

loans.name: Oscar Arnulfo

texts.es:
Oscar, estudio hasta cuarto grado, está casado, su esposa se dedica a los oficios domesticos y tiene 4 hijos de los cuales, 2 asisten a la escuela y los otros dos ya terminaron el bachillerato. 

Oscar, es agricultor desde muy pequeño y siempre ha trabajado en el campo, ya que su papá tambien se dedicaba al cultivo de granos basicos y como no pudo estudiar y obtener un trabajo formal decidio dedicarse a la agricultura. 

El crédito es para comprar insumos agricolas, ya que Oscar siempre ha adquirido préstamos que utiliza como capital de trabajo. 

Oscar, desea seguir trabajando en la agricultura.
texts.en:
Oscar has a fourth grade education. He is married and his wife is engaged in domestic tasks. They have 4 children. Two attend school and two have already graduated from high school.

Oscar has been a farmer since he was very young. He has always worked in the field since his father was also dedicated to the cultivation of basic grains. He could not study and get a formal job so he decided to farm. 

The loan will be used for agricultural inputs, he has always acquired loans to use as working capital. Oscar wants to continue working in agriculture.

loans.use: to invest in agricultural inputs

loans.name: Wilber Ignacio

texts.es:
Wilmer es un hombre de 32 años de edad que tiene un negocio de gallinas ponedoras, un hombre muy decidió y recursivo que para generar mayores ingresos fue directamente a buscar empresas que le compraran que aprovechara los huevos que se producen en su negocio que son de gallinas criollas alimentadas con maíz, en pocas palabras huevos de calidad.

Wilmer se separó de su esposa, dejándole un hogar para que habitara con sus dos hijos de 9 y 10, es muy responsable y cada fin de semana va a verlos, para ver como están y llevarles el dinero con el que pagan su alimentación y asisten a la escuela.

Wilmer se encuentra solicitando un préstamo la razón es que quiere expandir y ampliar su capacidad de producción, por ello el dinero lo invertirá en gallinas, y el resto de capital en maíz para tener abastecimiento de alimento de un semestre.
texts.en:
Wilmer is a 32-year-old who has a business of raising egg-laying hens. He is a man who decided to consistently generate higher revenues so he went to look for companies that will buy eggs that he produces. In short, he raises corn-fed “Criolla” chickens that produce high-quality eggs. 

Wilmer is separated from his wife. She left their home with their two children aged 9 and 10 . He is very responsible and sees his children every weekend. He sees how they are and brings the money to pay for their food and for the costs of school attendance. Wilmer is requesting a loan because he wants to expand and broaden his production capacity. He will invest the loan in chickens and in six-month’s worth of corn feed for them.

loans.use: to pay for six-month's worth of chicken feed

loans.name: Gregorio

texts.en:
Here is Gregorio, a resident of Payatas, Quezon City, Philippines. Recently, he had a loan worth PHP 24,000, which he had used for his retailing business within his vicinity. Actually, he sustains all his needs through his business while ably helping his family at the same time. This is why he would like to give his gratitude to those who previously lent him assistance. 

To improve sales, Gregorio would like to apply for a new loan to purchase additional products to sell. With the PHP 31,000 loan, he can certainly make his livelihood improve and eventually grow with the grace of God. For now, it is his desire to have people like you, who will assist him in his prospect. 

In the future, Gregorio hopes to give his family a more favorable kind of living and, simultaneously, drive up his inventory in order to progress. He also dreams of having his own car and seeing his children complete their schooling. 

Every week, he meets up with his co-fellowship members* to share stories of his work and draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God he studies.

* All Center for Community Transformation (CCT) community partners/clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and pay microfinance loans.

loans.use: to purchase additional products to sell.

loans.name: Carlos Angel

texts.es:
Carlos es uno de los orgullosos agricultores colombianos que trabajan en su terreno para generar no solo el sustento de su familia, si no de miles de personas que tienen algo que comer gracias a la labor de estos admirables trabajadores.

Él se dedica al cultivo de vegetales, un negocio que ha pasado de generación en generación y que espera poder dejarle en algún momento a un hijo si llega a tener ya que es separo de su esposa y no procreo.

El sueño de Carlos es tener salud para seguir trabajando por muchos años en algo que ama como lo es la agricultura, no pide lujos, comodidades, es feliz con su vida y en ocasiones como esta necesita apoyo. Carlos solicita un aliento económico para comprar insumos de mantenimiento y preparación de cultivos, lo destinara para la compra de abonos, riegos, gallina, semillas y pesticidas, y parte del préstamo lo invertirá en la cancelación del saldo anterior.
texts.en:
Carlosis one of the proud Colombian farmers who works his land to generate not only his family's sustenance but also so that thousands of people have something to eat, thanks to the labor of the admirable workers.

He works growing vegetables, a business that has passed from generation to generation and that he hopes to be able to leave some day to a child if he has one, since he is separated from his wife and doesn't have any children.

Carlos' dream is to have the health to continue working for many years at something that he loves, which is farming. He doesn't ask for luxuries or comforts, he is happy with his life and when, like now, he needs help, Carlos asks for a loan to purchase supplies to maintain and prepare the crops. This will be destined to purchase manure, hens, seeds, pesticide, and pay irrigation costs, and some of the loan will be invested in paying off his previous balance.

loans.use: to purchase manure, hens, seeds, pesticide, and pay irrigation costs.

loans.name: Leny

texts.en:
Leny is 39 years old, married, and has three children. Her husband works abroad. She operates a clothing sales business, which she has been doing for five years. 

Leny requested a loan for 15,000 PHP, which she will use to purchase stocks of blouses and pants. She hopes that this loan will help her improve her clothing sales business.

loans.use: to purchase stocks of blouses and pants

loans.name: Absalon

texts.en:
Absalon is 45 years old and married with five children, one child still in school, Absalon works very hard to provide for them.

Absalon runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 10000 loan through NWTF to purchase more groceries to sell like canned goods, noodles, spices, milk, coffee, drinks etc.

Absalon has been in this business for 10 years. 

She would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries to sell like canned goods, noodles, spices, milk, coffee, drinks etc

loans.name: Jeanneth

texts.en:
Jeanneth works hard to support her family. Jeanneth is married with three children and has a motorcycle transportation business in the Philippines.

Jeanneth requested a PHP 15000 loan through NWTF to buy spare parts, gasoline and maintenance for her motorcycle transportation business.

Jeanneth has been in this business for 4 years now.

She would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy spare parts, gasoline and maintenance for her motorcycle transportation business

loans.name: Analyn

texts.en:
As a married parent of three children, Analyn works hard to support her family.

She has a waeving business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from fish vending. Analyn is borrowing PHP 16000 through NWTF to buy materials for her weaving business.

Analyn has been sustaining her business activities through her past 8 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy materials for her weaving business

loans.name: Jehova Es Mi Guerrero Group

texts.es:
Este grupo formado por 3 mujeres con espíritu de superación y lucha, para salir adelante y brindarles mejores condiciones económicas a sus familias. Están solicitando por cuarta vez el financiamiento de ADIM y KIVA, para poder cumplir con sus metas. 
La líder del grupo es Claudia, de 40 años, quien es responsable de 1 hijo de 10 años. Tiene su pequeña tienda de productos varios en su hogar y vende ropa. Desde ya hace 10 años con ayuda de su esposo. El préstamo lo utilizara en la compra de colas, prensadores, aros, espagueti, sopas maggi, jabón, detergente y dos docenas de pantalones. Con el crédito anterior logro poner su tienda. Ahora con las ganancias que obtendrá desea seguir cumpliendo con las cuotas y aumentar más el negocio. 
Los demás integrantes son Justa de 62 años, quien  prepara y vende nacatamales, tortilla y vende ropa usada. Invertirá en la compra de leña, 1 cerdo, 1 paca surtida mixta ropa. Ana de 57 años se dedica a la venta de cosméticos quien los comercializa ambulantemente.
texts.en:
The members of this group are 3 women who struggle and persevere to get ahead and improve the economic situation of their families. This is the fourth time that they have requested a loan from ADIM and KIVA in order to meet their goals.

Claudia, aged 40, is the leader of the group, and is responsible for her 10-year-old son. She has a small store in her home selling general supplies and clothing. She has been doing this for more than 10 years with the help of her husband. The loan will be used to buy soft drinks, hair pins, rice, spaghetti, bouillon cubes, soap, detergent and two dozen pairs of pants. With the previous loan, she was able to set up her shop. With her earnings she hopes to be able to make her payments and grow her business. 

The other members of the group are Justa, aged 62, who prepares and sells tamales and tortillas (local foods), and sells used clothing. She will buy firewood, a pig and a bale of clothing. Ana, aged 57, is a street vendor who sells cosmetics.

loans.use: to buy soft drinks, hair pins, rice, spaghetti, bouillon cubes, soap, detergent and two dozen pairs of pants

loans.name: Braulio

texts.es:
Godoy es un joven de 23 años un increíble hombre que demostró desde pequeño sus ganas de salir adelante, de tener sus propias tierras de lograr sus propias metas, trabajo en la finca de su padre, donde ahorro dinero suficiente para comprar unas tierras y unos animales, llevaba casi 13 años en esta labora, adquirió experiencia y se fue desde joven a buscar sus propios caminos, se casó, pero luego de un tiempo se separó.

Ahora Godoy es un hombre que tiene su mente y cuerpo puesta en su labor, poco a poco va formando un gran sueño que ha tenido desde niño y es tener una finca a esta persona nadie le ha regalado nada todo lo logro con trabajo y negocios.

Godoy para ampliar su producción, mejorar sus condicione, generar más ingresos y tener un nuevo animal en su hogar quiere solicitar un préstamo parta la compra de 2 vacas lecheras con las que iniciara la venta de leche, teniendo como ventaja el contacto que tiene su padre el cual el compra la leche a buen precio pues sabe la calidad que maneja.

Este préstamo ayudara a Godoy a variar la producción de su finca y a necesitar empleados, dándole la oportunidad a un joven como él, de ganar experiencia y dinero realizando estas bellas labores del campo.
texts.en:
Godoy is a 23-year-old man, an incredible man who has shown since he was little his desire to get ahead, to have his own land and to achieve his own goals. He worked on his father's farm, where he saved up enough money to purchase some land and some animals. He has been doing this work for almost 13 years. He acquired experience and left when he was young, in search of his own path; he married, but after a while, he was separated.

Now Godoy is a man who has his mind and body in his work, little by little he is developing the big dream that he has had since he was a child, which is to have a farm. No one has ever given this person anything, everything he has achieved, he has done with work and business.

Godoy, to expand his production, improve his conditions, generate more income, and have a new animal in his house, he wants to ask for a loan to purchase 2 dairy cows with which he will begin to sell milk. He has the advantage of a contact of his father's who will purchase the milk at a good price because he knows the quality that he will get. 

This loan will help Godoy to vary the production on his farm and to need employees, giving a young man like himself an opportunity to gain experience and money doing the wonderful work of the countryside.

loans.use: to purchase two dairy cows.

loans.name: Fabio Andres

texts.es:
Fabio es un joven de 21 años de edad, soltero y sin hijos que asumió el mando del negocio de la familia el cual le dejo su padre, desde ese entonces se convirtió en el hombre de la casa generando los ingresos necesarios para el mantenimiento del hogar.

El negocio del hogar es una salsamentaría con cancha de tejo, que en pocas palabras es un lugar donde encuentras abarrotes, pero funciona como bar, teniendo el plus de la cancha de tejo un deporte muy tradicional en Colombia.

El propósito de Fabio ahora que es administrador y dueño es solo uno, elevar las ganancias y convertir la salsamentaría en un éxito total, generar recursos suficientes para el sustento de su familia y juntar capital para comprar una vivienda propia.

La idea de Fabio es iniciar el pie derecho con la salsamentaría incluyendo varios toques personales en remodelación y ubicación de sillas, creaciones de eventos y campeonatos haciendo un llamado al consumo y uso de cancha.

Fabio solicita un préstamo para la compra de materiales con los que remodelara el negocio, comprara cercas, sillas, mesas, pintara el local, arreglara la cancha de tejo, comprara totes y mechas (para la cancha de tejo) y surtido de cervezas y licores.
texts.en:
Fabio is a 21-year-old young man, single, with no children, who took over running the family business when his father left it to him. Since then, he has become the man of the house, generating the income necessary to maintain the household.

The household business is a grocery store with a tejo [traditional Colombian sport] field which, in a few words is a place where one can find groceries, but it also functions as a bar, and also has a tejo field, which is a very traditional sport in Colombia.  

Fabio's goal, now that he is the sole administrator and owner, is to increase the earnings and make the business a complete success, to generate enough resources to support his family and save enough capital to purchase his own house. 

Fabio's idea is to start off on the right foot with the business, including various personal touches in remodeling and setting up the chairs, creating events and tournaments, making a call for the use of the field. 

Fabio asks for a loan to purchase materials to remodel the business, he will purchase a fence, chairs, tables, will paint the location, fix up the tejo field, purchase tejos and small envelopes with the powder (for the tejo field) and an assortment of beer and liquor.

loans.use: to remodel his business, to purchase a fence, chairs, tables, to paint the location, and to fix up the tejo [a traditional Colobmbian sport] field.

loans.name: Andri

texts.en:
Good day, lenders! This is one of Ruma's agents, Andri. Andri lives in South Bogor, West Java, located about an hour from Jakarta, the capital city. Andri is a young guy who owns a stall where he sells mobile phone accessories and mobile airtime credits. He knows Ruma from sales executive who came to his own stall and explained about Ruma’s core and purpose. He is interested to join Ruma because he wants to learn how to improve his business more in technology, as well as give a contribution to his community.

As the business runs, Andri needs to get a working capital loan from Kiva. He will use the capital to provide more mobile payment services for his community. Having known about the importance, your loan will be very useful to help Andri improve his business and accordingly, his community which  needs access to such services. Andri's goal in the near future is to serve an e-commerce business for a low income community, a Ruma's latest product called Mapan, so his community can have access to better products with lower prices. Andri is the one who is seen in the photo. He will be very thankful for your kind support.

loans.use: to purchase additional prepaid airtime credit for helping community members who need access to communication service.

loans.name: Filiberto

texts.es:
Él es Filiberto una persona de 46 años de edad que trabaja diariamente 8 horas en su negocio de prestar servicios de podar césped, una actividad muy usual y utilizada en el campo y la ciudad.

Filiberto es padre de 3 hijas, 6, 10 y 16 años de edad, su sueño y obsesión es pagar la educación de sus hijos, mejorar sus condiciones de vivienda y cuando tenga suficiente capital vivir en la ciudad de Medellín donde hay universidades y posibilidades de empleo para sus muchachas.

Filiberto requiere de un aliento económica, un pequeño capital que destinara para el arreglo de su guadañadora y el resto de capital para mejorar su casa, fachada e interior, el préstamo es muy importante ya que la guadañadora es su herramienta principal de trabajo el cual paro por tener la herramienta descompuesta.
texts.en:
Filiberto is 46 years old and works eight hours a day trimming grass. There is a lot of landscaping business both in the country and the city.

Filiberto has three daughters, ages six, ten, and sixteen. His dream and his obsession are to pay for his children's education, improve their housing conditions and, as soon as he has enough capital, move to the city of Medellín, where there are Universities and employment opportunities for his girls.

Filiberto needs some financial support. He will use a small amount of the capital to repair his string trimmer, and the rest will go toward improving his home, both outside and inside. This loan is very important because his string trimmer is his main working tool and he had to stop working when it broke.

loans.use: to repair his string trimmer.

loans.name: Auner Ovel

texts.es: Auner es un hombre trabajador de 25 años de edad que cada día se despierta desde muy temprano para ir a comprar la fruta que venderá durante el día en el pequeño puesto que tiene a la orilla de la carretera. Auner vive en cada de su propiedad desde hace 9 años junto a su madre de 55 años de edad y su hermana menor a los que apoya económicamente. Auner cuenta con su negocio desde hace 2 años, por lo que ya cuenta con una gran cantidad de clientes, además el lugar donde se encuentra ubicado su negocio es muy popular por sus ventas, por lo que solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en: frutas de temporada para vender y cumplir con la demanda de productos con la que cuenta.
texts.en:
Auner is a hard-working, 25-year-old man. Everyday, he wakes up very early to go buy the fruit that he will sell during the day in a small stand that he has on the edge of the road. Auner has lived in his own house for nine 9, with his 55-year-old mother and his younger sister—both of whom he supports financially. 

Auner has had his business for 2 years. Because of this, he has many clients, and his fruit stand is located in a very popular place for his sales. 

He requests a loan from FUSAI to invest in seasonal fruits to sell and to meet the demand for his products.

loans.use: to invest in seasonal fruits to sell and to meet the demand for his products.

loans.name: Javier Antonio

texts.es:
Javier es un hombre de 33 años de edad que guiado por su corazón y gusto al trabajo independiente monto un negocio de tienda de abarrotes un negocio que ha significado mucho para su familia pues desde que lo tiene se ha visto el cambio en el aumento de la calidad de vida de su hogar, reflejado en la alimentación, el pago de las deudas, el estudio de sus hijos, incluso en su forma de vestir.

Conforme iba pasando el tiempo Javier iba invirtiendo todo su dinero en el negocio, empezó vendiendo abarrotes, luego granos, luego productos personal, luego productos refrigerados, ahora empezó con helados, verduras, su negocio ha crecido exponencialmente y agradece a la fidelidad y buenas recomendaciones de su clientes. 


Javier es padre de dos muchachos ellos tienen 10 y 6 años de edad, les gusta mucho futbol y apoya su pasión inscribiéndolos a escuelas y torneos de futbol su mayor reto para la vida es mantenerlos en condiciones dignas  y pagar sus estudios universitarios.

Javier se encuentra solicitando un apoyo económico el cual desea invertir en la compra de surtido para la heladería y la verdulería, pensando en potenciar este mercado y promover mucho más la venta de estos productos en su tienda que son nuevos.
texts.en:
Javier is a 33-year-old man, who is guided by his heart and likes to work independently. He started a grocery store business, which has a lot of significance for his family; since he has had the business, the family has seen an increase in the quality of life of their household. This is reflected in their nutrition, paying their debts, their children’s education, and the way they dress.

Over time, Javier has invested all of his money in the business. He started selling groceries, then grains, then personal products, then refrigerated products, and now he has started selling frozen products and vegetables. His business has grown exponentially, thanks to the loyalty and good recommendations from his clients.

Javier is the father of two sons who are 10 and 6 years old. They like soccer a lot, and he supports their passion by enrolling them in school and soccer tournaments. His biggest challenge in life is maintaining dignified conditions and paying for their university education.

Javier is requesting a loan, which he wants to invest in buying supplies of frozen products and vegetables. He plants to strengthen his market and promote the sale of these new products in his store.

loans.use: to buy supplies of frozen products and vegetables.

loans.name: Dilshod

texts.en:
Dilshod is a brave man. He was born in the southern part of Tajikistan in 1986. He is living in a remote district with his family. He is married and has three children.

He is a worker. He works at a statistics agency in a small town. His major is economics; he has worked about seven years on his specialty. Recently, he has been studying his second higher education.
